111.content:
"Atomic Betty, the mission you are about to undertake is perilous and fraught with danger," Admiral DeGill announced.

"I'm ready for anything," the young red haired girl said with confidence. She offered a salute to the well dressed fish that was her commanding officer.

"I'm glad to hear that. Now listen carefully. The Galactic Guardians have caught wind of a criminal summit. We don't know all the details but we do know most of the infant crime lords will be in attendance. Infantor, 'Messy' Don Fabritinie, Sandy Santonia AKA 'The Diapered Dame,' Joseph 'The Bottle' Riccardo, the list goes on."

Sparky spoke up. "And you want Betty here to go in there and arrest those diapered delinquents right?" the green alien asked.

"Wrong." Degill put his pipe in his mouth and began blowing bubbles. "If the Galactic Guardians were to come within a dozen light years of that summit everyone involved will turn tail and run."

"Then what exactly is the plan?" asked the robotic X-5.

"We want Betty to infiltrate the summit undercover and spy on the proceedings. This way we will be able to learn exactly what those criminals are planning."

"Wait. You want me to go undercover? You mean..."

"We have already concocted an elaborate cover for this mission. You will pose as Patricia 'The Pacifier' Petrovich."

"You want me to dress up as a baby?"

"It is the only way. The guest list is composed solely of infant crime lords and they are very distrustful of anyone with toilet training." DeGill pulled his pipe out of his mouth. "You are our most trusted agent Atomic Betty. However, if you feel you aren't up to the task, we may be able to find someone else."

Betty thought it over for a moment. "No sir. If anyone has to take this risk it may as well be me."

"Excellent." DeGill jumped down from his desk. "The first order of business is to get you properly dressed." The Admiral lead the three down the hall and into another room. When they were inside Betty noticed a rack of baby clothes in one corner of the room. Along one side of the room was a changing table, complete with an assortment of diapers resting on its shelves.

"Well, no sense delaying any longer. Betty do you have a preference as to who you would like changing your diapers?"

"What?" Betty exclaimed. "I thought I was just dressing like a baby. You can't honestly expect me to actually use one of those things!"

"This summit is going to take several days to conclude and we need you to remain undercover the entire time. That is why we need your cover to be as thorough as possible, otherwise you'd be signing your own death warrant. It is imperative you use your diapers exactly as a baby would. You will need to learn to suckle from a bottle, cry, be spoon fed your meals and mess your diapers as though it was second nature."

As DeGill went on Betty could feel her stomach churn. The fate of the galaxy depended on her pooping in a diaper?

She almost backed out. However, her sense of duty got the better of her and she removed her street clothes leaving her in her underwear.

"Alright. X-5, I guess you're on," she gulped, "diaper duty." She hopped onto the changing table. X-5 was a robot, surely it would be less embarrassing to have him change her diapers right? After all, the alternative was to have Sparky do it.

"All right Captain. I will comply. Please remove your underwear and lie down."

Betty did so. X-5 rolled over and grabbed a bottle of baby powder and a diaper. He sprinkled a small amount of powder on her bottom and her crotch. Then he moved in to put the diaper on. As he got his hands closer Betty took note of the snapping claws that were X-5's hands as they neared her private area.

"On second thought maybe Sparky ought to do this," the naked girl said nervously.

"As you wish." X-5 handed Sparky the diaper and rolled away.

The green alien cautiously approached his captain. "So how exactly do I do this?"

Betty had never been more mortified in her life. She lifted up her bum. "Just slide it under here." Sparky did so. "Now pull the front part of the diaper over my, um." She started blushing again. "Just pull it up and use the tapes to hold it in place." Sparky did as he was told. Betty sat up, her legs dangling off the edge of the table. "Um could I get a shirt or something?" she asked covering her chest.

"Sure thing chief!" Sparky quickly retrieved a t-shirt and shoved it on top of Betty's head. Now that she was dressed Betty hopped down from the table and examined herself.

The diaper was quite bulky, certainly more than she was used to. She put her hand on the front of the diaper and listened to the soft crinkle of plastic. She could feel the diaper pressing up against her rear and she could feel the fabric squeeze every time she closed her legs together.

"DeGill spoke up once again. "Now that you are properly dressed we should begin your training."
111.title: Special Assignment

1111.content:
"Come on chief! You can do it!"

"Sparky, could you not do that? I really don't need a cheerleader right now." Betty's legs were crossed in front of her while she remained sitting on a chair. They were training her to use her diaper, but it was hard going.

"Captain, you've crossed your legs again," X-5 pointed out.

The red-head looked down and realized he was right. "Sorry." She uncrossed her legs. "I've just never done anything like this before. Usually I try to avoid wetting my pants."

"Do you want some more water?" Sparky suggested.

"No thanks. I think I've had all the water I can stomach." Her bladder was aching enough as it was.

"But you still have yet to urinate into your diaper," X-5 pointed out.

Betty let out a frustrated sigh. "I know, but this isn't as easy as I thought it was going to be. I've been toilet-trained for years, it's not like I can just forget how to use the bathroom."

"Perhaps. However there must eventually become a point were your body is no longer capable of holding in all your urine."

"Yeah, sure." Betty crossed her legs again without thinking about it. Truth is she really didn't want to wet her diaper, even if it was important to her training.

"Maybe we should try something else," Sparky said aloud. He leaned over to X-5 and whispered into his ear. The robot nodded and scooted off. He was gone barely a minute before he returned carrying something in his hands.

"Is that a baby bottle?" Betty asked.

"Yup." Sparky grabbed the bottle from X-5. "Nice and warm too."

"The bottle has been warmed to exactly 37 degrees centigrade, or the internal temperature of a human."

"Look, I don't know about this. Besides didn't you say we were going to start with diaper wetting?"

"Don't worry chief. Uncle Sarky's got everything under control!" Sparky sat himself down on a couch and patted the spot next to him.

Still unsure about the whole ordeal Betty got up and walked across the room. It was slow going as she still kept her legs crossed out of habit. When she finally sat down next to Sparky she reached out for the bottle. Sparky however had other ideas.

"Nuh-uh! You're a baby now remember! And babies don't feed themselves."

"Then how?" Sparky patted his lap in response. Tired of arguing, Betty positioned herself so that her head was on Sparky's lap. Before she could do anything else she found the nipple shoved into her mouth.

As Betty murmured her displeasure through the nipple, Sparky simply told her to suck. It took her a while to get used to the mechanics of suckling, but it wasn't long before Betty could taste warm milk coming out of the bottle.

For the first time since she had accepted her new assignment, Betty started to relax. That's all it took for her bladder to release. Betty was immediately aware of of the warmth that was spreading from her crotch. The girl spat out the rubber nipple and sat up. At least she tried to sit up. Sparky put a hand on her chest and told her to stay still.

Betty did just that. By this point she was too engrossed by what was happening in her diaper to move at all. She tried to stop wetting herself but she just couldn't, no matter how hard she tried. The warmth continued down to her bottom and upwards soaking the front of her diaper. When she was finished Betty finally stood up to inspect what she had just done.

The diaper seemed much heavier on her now and felt squishy when she touched it. Sparky put a hand on her shoulder and congratulated her.

"This is only the first step in your training," X-5 reminded her. "You still have a long way to go before you will be able to impersonate an infant crime lord."

Betty's face contorted into a frown. She was regretting taking this assignment more and more every minute. Without thinking she sat down onto her wet diaper and felt the squishy material cushion her bum.
1111.title: Diaper training

choices: Betty succesfully listens in on their plans.
Betty's cover is blown and she gets caught.
1112.content:
It was three weeks later when Betty and her crew made their way to the criminal summit. Despite a slow start, Betty had eventually learned everything she needed to in order to pass as one of the infant crime lords. All her meals were now fed to her in her high chair or given to her in her bottle. She had learned to become cranky whenever she didn't get what she wanted and she now soiled her diapers without a second thought.

"Alright captain, final docking procedures have been initiated," X-5 said aloud. Betty nodded in understanding. She looked down at herself. She was wearing a pink dress, not entirely unlike her Galactic Guardian uniform. The dress was short enough that one could easily flip up her skirt and examine her diaper to see if it was wet or messy. In a few minutes she would be surrounded by criminals, and if her disguise wasn't good enough to fool them she'd be in big trouble. Just thinking about it made her wet herself, though she didn't notice.

"Okay chief, your ride is here!" Sparky said as he brought in a hover carriage large enough for Betty to fit inside. Sparky was to pose as her caretaker for the duration of the mission and he was dressed the part. This wasn't the first time Betty had seen Sparky in a dress, but she did hope it would be the last. Betty crawled inside the carriage and was handed a bottle.

"Docking process complete captain," X-5 announced. "You may now disembark." Sparky pushed the carriage down the ship's ramp. Within seconds they were greeted by a pair of thugs.

"Name?"

Betty gathered her thoughts before she took the bottle out of her mouth. Time to see just how good an actor she could be. "Name's Petrovich. I prefer to be called 'The Pacifier' and I expect you two scrubs to remember that, less you want to make me angry."

After glancing at their lists for a second the pair waved them on through. When they were past Betty let out a sigh of relief. So far so good.

Soon enough The pair had made their way to the conference room. She looked around at the one who had already arrived. She saw the green-skinned Infantor and his younger, yet much larger, brother, arguing about something as usual. Infantor wore an orange onesie, while his brother wore a red bib and a cloth diaper, complete with huge safety pin. Joseph "The Bottle" Ricardo was also present, suckling a gold plated bottle. Betty put down her own bottle and crawled out of her carriage where Sparky quickly put her pacifier in her mouth. She then made her way to the central table, being careful to toddle unstably, lest anyone suspect she was older than her attire would suggest.

Finally sitting down on her diapered bottom Betty noticed a pungent smell. Looking to her left she could see she was sitting next to "Messy" Don Fabritini. The blue infant crime lord wore a t-shirt and disposable diaper. Glancing down at the bulge in the back of his diaper it was easy to see it had already been used. That reminded Betty that she hadn't had a messy diaper in some time. No sooner had the thought entered her head then Betty felt a rumbling below. Her body had begun to push out her own poop into her already wet diaper.

"Okay yous guys." Infantor called the meeting to order. "Soon as 'The Diapered Dame' shows up we's can start this ear meeting."

"Don't hold up on my account." A voice came from off to Betty's right as a door opened. In walked a an alien girl with pinkish purple skin. Her diaper immediately caught Betty's eye as it was not only prominently on display but appeared to be diamond studded.

As the final arrival sat down next to Betty the Galactic Guardian felt a wave of pleasure run up her spine. She could feel the first of her load push against the thick padding of her diaper. The feeling caused her to suck on her pacifier harder.

Once "The Diapered Dame" had taken her seat Infantor stood up and said, "Nows we can begins."
1112.title: The infant crimelord summit

choices: Betty tries to warn Galactic guardian HQ.
11121.content:
Betty kept pushing out more poop into her awaiting diaper. All those weeks of training had paid off and she was able to soil herself without any trouble at all.

"We's been persecuted by them adults for ways too longs," Infantor began. "They's think they're so much better than us, cuz they can eat solid food and don't wears no diapers. Well we's is gonna change that."

Joseph "The Bottle" Riccardo stopped sucking on his bottle long enough to ask a question. "You got some way to take out everybody's teeth?"

"What? No. But I got a plan to deal with that other thing." Infantor pushed a button on the side of his rattle and a hologram appeared in the middle of the conference table. An image of a satellite appeared. "My brother and me has been workings on making a fleet of these satellites to carry out ours plan. Theys each have a special ray that the Diapered Dame cooked up. Once wes deploy these things they'll fly to a planet and fires its ray down at it."

"And what does this ray do?" asked "Messy" Don Fabritini.

"I'm glad you asked," the Diapered Dame responded. "It's a special ray I've designed that will make it so everyone on the planet will loose all of their potty training. Permanently."

That elicited a roar of approval from the infant crime lords. "Finally those darned grown ups won't think they're so much better than us. They'll be wearing diapers just like we do." That remark came from Infantor's younger, but much larger, brother.

"Right. But as soons as we launch this plan the Galactic Guardians will be all over us like baby powder on our butts. That's why we needs everybody here to take a bunch of satellites and strike as many planets as we can all at the sames time."

Everyone was more than happy to volunteer their resources to help with this plan. For the better part of an hour they discussed how many satellites each baby would need and who would be hitting what planets. Infantor made it clear that he would be the one attacking Earth. Finally the Diapered Dame called for a recess. "I don't know about you, but my diaper is soaked." As she said this she squeezed the front of her diaper giving off a squelching noise. "I say we take a break." She smelled the air and addressed Betty. "Don't you think so stinky?"

Betty blushed. Indeed her diaper was filled with her poo and she could use a change. "All rights. We take a break and meet back heres in an hour," Infantor called out. The other crime lords dispersed and Sparky picked up Betty, put her in her carriage and wheeled her to the little girls room.

When they were inside Sparky put Betty on a changing table and began to change her diaper. As he did he whispered to his charge. "So they're going to make it so everyone in the galaxy has to wear diapers? I don't like this plan of theirs one bit."

Betty nodded in agreement. "We need to warn DeGill and then find a way to-" Betty immediately shut up as the door opened and a nanny carried the Diapered Dame inside the room and set her down next to Betty.

"So, did you like my new toy?" she said as her diamond studded diaper glistened in the light.

Betty didn't like it one bit. "It's the bee's knees sister. You must be real proud of yourself. Now we won't be the only ones messing our britches."

"You sound like a boy," the Dame muttered. "All you can think about is how they're potty trained and we're not and how that just isn't fair."

"If this ain't about us being stuck in diapers than what is it about?" By now Sparky had began to wipe down Betty's poopy bottom.

"I own the largest diaper manufacturing company in the galaxy. Infantor's satellite plan just means that many more customers for me."

Of course, this was all about money. At least to her. Betty glanced at the nurse as she put the diamond studded diaper into a bag. "So what do you do with the rocks when you've been wiped down? You don't throw them out do you?"

"Oh heavens no. Once I'm done with them my diapers have all their precious jewels pulled out and cleaned off. Then they get made into another even cuter diaper. I make a point never to wear the same design twice."

Sparky finished powdering Betty's bottom and fastened a new diaper onto her.

Now that she heard the crime lords plans what would be the best course of action? Should she try to leave the conference and warn the Galactic Guardians? Or would it be better to remain behind and learn more about the plan? Maybe stop them from carrying out their plot from here? As Betty sucked on her pacifier she thought over her options.
11121.title: Diabolical Diaper Devices

choices: Girl Time with The Diapered Dame
111212.content:
“You know, I never got your name?” The Diaper Dame questioned, leering at the undercover agent slightly as Betty tried to keep up the act.

“The names Patricia ‘The Pacifier’ Petrovich.” Betty informed as the female alien’s nurse started to powder her diaper before putting her in a gold colored diaper with red, green and blue gems studded. She wondered if that was real gold or if it was colored gold, either way it looked tacky to her.

“Well Petrovich, keep this a secret from the other stinky boys and I’ll give you a small cut for your silence.” The Diaper Dame hops off the changing table as she walks out with her nurse. Allowing the two agents to sigh with relief from having to put on that act.

“So, what are we going to do chief?” Sparky inquired as he picks her, putting her into the hover carriage.

“That Diapered Dame plans on making a quick buck on everyone’s misfortune.” Betty began. “We’re going to make sure these devices aren’t ready to go. We’ll have to keep up the act if we’re going to need to get close to sabotage them.” Afterwards, we see the two sneaking over to where the other padded criminals were sitting and having a meal or playing a video game. Sparky takes her out of the carriage and puts the pacifier back in her mouth as she toddles over to them.

She then began to wonder who she should talk to about the invasion plan. Joseph “The Bottle” Riccardo had more money meaning he could hit more planets with hired help. ‘Messy’ Don Fabritine has more aids meaning he could coordinate more planets better. Infantor and his brother are going to hit Earth making it Betty’s first priority. And let’s not forget The Diapered Dame in all this, talking to her would allow you to figure out how the devices would work and disable them properly.
111212.title: Padded Espionage

choices: The Diapered Dame figures out its Betty
The Diapered Dame asks Betty to join her company
1112124.content:
Betty thought about it for a while, as she rationalizes that if she learned more about the machine, she'd be able to disarm it. She crawls over to the Diapered Dame and started to think of a way to get the information out of her without her realizing it. She's already managed to chat with her once when they were in the girls room, perhaps she could get to know her better from that one encounter. She sees that the infant in question was on a digital tablet looking over a map of the star system.

"Ey, Diapered Dame~, how's about you and I talk?" Betty asked using her Patricia accent as the leader of the summit looks up.

"I'm a little busy, figuring out an escape route for some of my fleets." The Diapered Dame dismissed her.

"I was just wondering about something, perhaps I should let out that dirty little secret of how you're going to profit off this. I'm sure one of the boys would love to hear that." Betty smirks as the Diapered Dame looks up and smirks at her.

"Clever girl. Alright, you have my attention." She declared as they started to crawl off together with the Diapered Dame's nanny following close behind. Betty looks back at Sparky who gives her a thumbs up in response.

"What gave you the idea to make these satellites? I want to know how your thought process works." Betty inquired.

"Well, due to how my diaper company is losing money on potty-training, I started to research frequencies and other ways to affect the bladder and bowel control." The Diapered Dame disclosed. "I discovered a brown note of sorts that not only affects the bowels but the bladder goes afterwards. Anyone hit by this brown note once would lose their control for weeks. But thanks to my modifications to it with my new toy, it will cause anyone hit with it to permanently lose their potty training all together."

"Wow, that's a devious plan you gots in your head Damey." Betty smiles trying to keep up the act.

"You know, before I continue I have something to ask you." The Diapered Dame goes in close causing Betty to look nervous, accidentally letting loose in her diaper.
1112124.title: Betty and the Diapered Dame

choices: Ben teases Gwen until she wets herself.
112.content:
"Just five more minutes grandpa." The boy murmured in his sleep.

The ten year old girl snorted a response. "Wake up Ben, this is no time to be lying down on the job." Still the boy continued to sleep.

Agitated, the girl pinched her cousin's nose . After a second of pained snorting the brown haired boy shot straight up. "Hey dweeb! What's the big idea?!"

"Oh I'm sorry. I just thought you'd be less useless if you were awake!"

Ten year old Ben Tennyson started rubbing his eyes. "I'm useless? Look who's talking..." Ben stopped mid word as he lanced at his cousin. Immediately he started giggling. "Love the new look dweeb! What happened, get tired of using the toilet in the Rust Bucket?"

Gwen Tennyson looked down at her cousin and frowned. Still, Ben continued to laugh at her. He couldn't believe what he was seeing! His snooty, dweeb of a cousin was standing right in front of wearing the most ridiculous outfit. She had on a bright pink, lacy, super frilly dress. The lower part of it stopped just past her hips given him a clean view of her underwear every time she made the slightest movement. What was most surprising though was what she was wearing underneath her skirt. It looked almost exactly like a baby's diaper!

"Keep laughing Doofus! I'm not the only one who's had a recent wardrobe change!"

Ben immediately stopped laughing. Now that she mentioned it something did feel a little bit off. Worried, Ben looked down at himself immediately crying out and jumping to his feet. "Gah! What- what am I wearing?"

"Well it looks to me like you're wearing a t-shirt and a big bulky diaper. Frankly I think it's about time you started dressing your age."

Realizing that his cousin could see his exposed diaper Ben's hands shot down to cover it. He grabbed the bottom of his shirt and pulled it down, though it barely did anything to conceal the diaper he had on.

"Why the heck am I even wearing this thing?" Ben asked. His eyes then began to wander about the room. "For that matter, where are we?" The walls and floor of the room they were standing in were covered with a thick cream coloured padding. Stuffed toys were strewn about here and there but he couldn't find any sign of a door.

"I'm not sure." Gwen answered, her tone turning to one of worry. "I remember we were walking around the forest in the middle of the night..."

"Oh yeah. We were trying to find the Rust Bucket after we got separated in the fight with that weird lizard looking thing."

"Salamander." Gwen corrected. This caused Ben to stick his tongue out at her. She ignored him and continued on. "I remember there was a bright light..."

"I remember that too. Then I felt like I was floating." He stopped. "You know what this probably means right?"

"We were abducted by aliens? With our luck I wouldn't doubt it. Question is, why are we dressed like this?" She looked down and began to examine herself. The dress she wore didn't look all that alien, though it was way to girly for her tastes. She pulled up her skirt and began feeling the diaper-like thing she had on.

The material it was made of looked and felt a lot like plastic, but at the same time it was different. It was elastic, yet firm. Pushing against it she could feel a fair amount of padding between her skin and the outside world. Her hands ran along the waist looking for a seam or fasteners of some kind. She found what looked like some kind of seal on either side of the garment but she could not get it to budge.

"Crap. I can't find a way to get this thing off,' she murmured. She began tugging at it to try and take it off but had no success.

"I'm not having any luck either." Ben muttered. "Oh well. Nothing a little four arms can't fix!" He cried out as he reached for the Omnitrix that was bonded to his left arm. When his hand came close though he felt something pushing it back. Confused he felt around the alien device. "Uh-oh."

"Uh-oh what?"

"It's the Omnitrix. It's like there's some kind of force field around it. I can't even touch it!"

"Well hurry and think of something fast! I need to get this diaper off!"

"Yeah. I'll be glad to get this thing off of me too."

"No dummy." Gwen snapped. "I mean I really need to get this off of me. Like right now!"

Ben glanced over at his cousin and noticed she was holding herself and dancing about on the spot. He couldn't help himself. "What's the matter? Little baby gonna make a pee-pee?"

"Cram it Ben! This is so not funny!" Her bladder felt like it was about to explode and it was taking everything she had to hold back the river of urine that was trying to escape.
112.title: Wakey wakey

1121.content:
Suddenly a strange echoey voice filled the room. The language it spoke was unfamiliar to both Tennesons. After looking around for a minute trying to locate the source of the sound, the voice called again. This time they followed the voice to it's source, a gray humanoid figure that Ben swore wasn't standing there the last time he looked. Ben laughed as Gwen blushed, trying to hold in her urine.

Its long, large arms reached out and stuck a blue pacifier in Ben's mouth and he stopped laughed. The creature's voice echoed again as it grabbed Ben, his skin feeling almost like leather, with just one arm and in one move, checked his diaper while properly dressing him in a pair of frilly socks and a long white gown with a blue sailor suit look to it. Thanks to the pacifier, Ben couldn't even try to fight it. He was set down again as the large hands grabbed Gwen next.
1121.title: Pacification

choices: Got angry and lashed out at ben
1122.content:
Ben kept laughing. "Gwen don't tell me you're gonna wet yourself like a little baby."

Gwen struggled to get the diaper off, barely able to contain her bladder. "N-never! I just want this stupid thing off now!" Gwen yelled. She was using all her will to keep herself from peeing. She'd die of embarrassment if she lost control in front of her immature cousin.

Ben walked over to Gwen. "You need to relax. I think I can help." Ben began tickling Gwen. Gwen began laughing and screaming.

"Ben stop it! seriously!" Gwen begged. She wouldn't be able to hold it for long. "Oh god no!" Gwen screamed and fell on her padded butt. It was then that the impact caused her to release her bladder, flooding her diaper with piss. The noise was so loud she could hear it over Ben's laughing.

"Oh man! All the times you talked about ME being immature, and now you wet yourself!" Ben teased.

Gwen...
1122.title: Tickling and tinkling

choices: The two try and find a way to get out.
11221.content:
"SHUT UP BEN!" Gwen yelled. She lunged at her cousin, yanking at his hair and pinning him down on the floor. She feet the energy of her magic build, crawling through her body like electricity and then... nothing.

She felt the magic leave from her palms, but was too frustrated to really notice. The cold padding on the floor clashing with the warm, wet yet strangely clammy padding between her legs. The smell of baby powder in the room. These sensations draining her strength and fueling her anger. She bumped her right knee into Ben's padded crotch and stopped struggling. Ben had wet himself and she only now noticed. She got off of him and sat back, crossing her arms over her chest.
"Look who's wet themselves now," said Gwen, a minor smugness on her face.

"What are talking about? I'm not..." Ben got up, realizing the warmth between his legs. He blushed brightly and looked to the side, too embarrassed to respond.
11221.title: What goes around

112212.content:
Suddenly, without warning, a large hole grew from the wall to their left. Stepping through the spontaneous entrance was clearly alien, though could be recognized as female. The being floated into the room, balancing on a pin instead of legs - much like a spinning top. It had bone-white skin with even brighter clothes similar to that of an egyptian dress. The creature's face had clear-blue eyes and a mouth, but no nose.

Before Ben and Gwen could respond, the two suddenly brought up by a pair of floating chairs that appeared below them.

"What?""Hey!" The both exclaimed, straps climbing over them, preventing them from falling off. The chairs floated towards the alien being, and...
112212.title: The captor revealed

choices: They snap back and try to fight it.
1122121.content:
"Uh, Hi." Ben said, confused with what was happening. "I don't think you understand what your doing, because you can't do this too us! We aren't babies, or at least I'm not, and as soon as I find out how get bthe omnitirx working again, I'm gonna..." Ben wanted to continue his threat, but the words turned dry and brittle in his mouth. The Alien's clothes morphed, the straps over its chest moving to the center of it's chest, revealing two large, human-like breasts, Ben blushed violently, his natural hormones getting the better of him.

Gwen, realizing what was about to happen, scrambled through her thoughts to figure out what to do. She felt the floating seat she was sitting in float towards the alien. She raised her hands up and started to glow. "Emoka Emjec..." but before she could finish her spell, her face was shoved into the alien's breast. Ben joined her at the other breast. Their lips tingled, a warm, sweet liquid sprayed across their tongues and filled their stomachs. They could not stop, almost as if they were compelled to. As the milk quenched their thirst, their minds began to drift, forgetting everything that was happening to them.
1122121.title: Feeding Time

choices: They find a crease in the wall.
11221212.content:
Gwen woke up later, her brain foggy and her mouth laced with the aftertaste of the milk from earlier. Ben was waking up next to her, also dazed out of his mind. They were both wearing identical onesies, Gwen wearing pink and Ben wearing blue, snaps clipped over their shoulders and down at their groins. They both took a look at each other, and they could not help but groan.

They were disgusted by what they were wearing, but they were even more disgusted by what they felt. Both of their diapers were full. Whatever was in that milk they were fed was strong enough.

Ben cringed as he sat up from the floor, feeling the mess squishing about under his butt. Gwen sat up with him, their mutual situation making them feel like they were going to cry.

"Well" Gwen sniffed, "what now?"

"I don't know," Ben answered, holding back tears. He struggled to get on his feet, his toes sinking into the padding in the room. He felt the load in his diaper hang between his legs, the onesie preventing the heavy contents of his diaper from undoing itself. "But we're getting out of here."
11221212.title: Two stinky babies

choices: They try to find an exit.
1122122.content:
The chairs beneath them began to morph, becoming cube-like. They felt a soft padding under them, the straps tying them down tightened over them, laying them on their backs.

"Ben."

"What?"

"I think she's our nurse!" said Gwen, realizing with horror. Ben was not sure how to fact until the alien raised her arm. Organically, her two arms split themselves into four, two of them reaching into the cabinets of the newly formed table and pulled out, to Ben's surprise, two identicle baby diapers.

Both of them struggled through their straps but it was futile. The alien unstrapped their diapers, simultaniously changing them. They both felt a chill crawl up their backs as the cool wipes brushed across their private areas. She lifted their legs up and strapped the new diapers over their groins.

The hole in the wall reopened as the alien floated away, closing the hole behind them. The changing tables slowly melted, the straps holding the two of them down breaking off as they were slowly placed back on the ground.
1122122.title: Double diaper duty

choices: Grandpa Max tries to rescue them.
11223.content:
Is was at that moment that Gwen felt a pressure in her bowels. Immediatly she knew that she had to poop, badly. She faced a little dilemma since she still couldn't get the diaper off. She got up and tried to remove the diaper, but the pressure was getting worse. She kept on trying until she gave up and despite her best efforts her eyes began to water. Ben tried asking her what was wrong. Then he saw it. At that moment Gwen was pushing out a load of poop into her already wet diaper. Ben couldn't believe his eyes, he just burst out into laughter. Gwen was mortified by the entire experience. Tears started to flow freely down her cheeks as she continued to push the warm load of poop into her diaper.

When Gwen had finally finshed her business the two children turned their attention to one of the walls of the perfectly white room they were trapped in. A small circular hole appeared on one particular spot on the wall. Within the span of a second it enlarged to the point that it was the size of a large doorway. Then someone entered.
11223.title: Gwen continues to make a mess of herself

choices: The alien forces Ben to relieve himself.
112231.content:
Neither of the Tennyson children knew quite what they were looking at, though whatever it was it certainly wasn't from Earth. It was a tall lanky and creature with four arms and white skin. It didn't look entirely inhuman, it had a mouth and eyes, though there was no visible nose.

The figure raised one hand and Gwen suddenly found herself floating in the air. Beneath her another hole opened in the floor and a white cylinder-like structure raised up. The structure was covered in a pure, reflective white, all except for the top which seemed to be covered in soft padding. Soon Gwen was set down on it.

The alien walked up to Gwen and looked down at her. Gwen was in no mood for this and sat up. "Look, I don't care who you are but there is no way I'm going to let you just- Mph!" She was silenced by the pacifier that was shoved into her mouth. Observing the foreign object she noticed a purple light that was glowing. She tried to spit it out but her mouth didn't seem to want to co-operate.

A series of white straps shot out from the surface of the table and wrapped around Gwen's upper arms pulling her down to a lying position. The strange alien leaned over and began to tickled her nose making strange noises as it did so.

Ben watched the whole scene unfold wishing he could access his Omnitrix. Another opening appeared, this time in the side of the table. Ben could see several more of the diapers that he was wearing located inside as well as several other items. He had a feeling he knew what was going to happen next.

The alien pulled out one of the diapers and set it on the surface next to Gwen. She immediately began screaming her objections but the pacifier muffled her cries. The alien effortlessly opened up the diaper Gwen was wearing and began to wipe her butt until it was suitably clean. Next some baby powder was applied to her rear and Gwen's legs were lifted up so the new diaper could be placed underneath her. Her bottom made contact with the diaper and it was soon brought up over her front and taped shut.

Once the diaper change had been completed the straps holding her down disappeared allowing Gwen to move freely once again. She immediately sat up and hoped off the table. As soon as her feet touched the ground she noticed the light on her pacifier turned off. Experimentally she pulled on it again, this time coming out easily. turning to glance once more at the alien she ran over to where Ben was standing, blushing furiously.

Before Ben could open his mouth Gwen said in an icy tone. "Not. One Word."

The alien made it's was over to he pair and knelt down in front of Ben. "Uh, Hi. I'm Ben Tennyson. This is my stupid Cousin Gwen. I was just wondering why you abducted us and put us in these diapers and everything. Cause if you don't I'm going to go all four arms on your butt and give you a pounding."

The aliens response was to put one of its hands on Ben's head and tussle his hair. Gwen stepped next to her cousin. "Hey dummy. You can't use the Omnitrix remember?"

Ben frowned at that. "Oh, and I suppose you're just brimming with bright ideas? We don't even know what this thing wants with us."

Gwen observed the alien as it made a grabbing motion towards Ben's nose. It then pulled its hand back and made a fist waving it playfully at Ben.

"Wait a minute! I know exactly what it wants with us!"

"Do tell."

"The diapers, this stupid pacifier, the alien's behavior. It thinks we're babies!"

"Yeah? Well I don't need a nanny!" Turning to the alien he started to shout. "Listen stupid. I'm not sure if you can tell but we're not babies. At least I'm not anyway." The alien continued to make more indecipherable noises. "I don't think she can understand us." The alien started to poke at Ben's diaper. "Hey! quit it!"

"I think it want's you to, you know..." Ben stared at her. "Go"

"What?! No way!" Ben stepped back. "The strangest part was, he really did have to go. He wondered if the alien could know that somehow. Suddenly the alien reached out with its arms and lifted Ben up.
112231.title: First contact

1122311.content:
The alien then poked Ben on his stomach and he felt a strange rumbling sensation. Ben grit his teeth and tried to hold himself but before long he could no longer resist and he felt a something in his bowels. Within seconds Ben was emptying all of his poop into his diaper.

Next, the strange alien put Ben on the changing table, opens the drawer and took out another diaper.

Before Ben could do anything the alien had started to change the diaper. The tapes were opened and Ben's privates were exposed to the air. The alien took a wipe and wiped his privates and butt. Ben moaned slightly due to the coldness of the wipe, then he was powdered and rediapered. He couldn't quite understad why but for some reason he actually seemed to like it when the alien changed his diaper. He had weird sensations that made him feel good when his bottom was wiped, or when the powder was rubbed into his skin.

Finished its task the alien disposed of the dirty diaper and let Ben down off the changing table.
1122311.title: Making messes

choices: To the Ship's Main Kindergarten with Young One.
11223111.content:
Two seats entered through the large doorway the strange alien entered, floating with no visible source of propulsion. The alien gestured to them.

"I think it wants us to sit in them," said Gwen.

"N-No way am I going anywhere with that thing after what it did to--hey!!!" As a strange belt-like strap reached out from one of the seats and grabbed Ben, wrapping around his arms and legs and pulling him into the chair, buckling him in like a seat-belt. The other chair did the same to Gwen, though she put up less defiance. Trays appeared in front of the two kids with a small assortment of strange, colorful shapes and trinkets, alien objects that Gwen assumed were meant to amuse babies.

The alien escorted the two floating chairs across a long, empty hallway, other identical aliens floating around, entering and exiting holes that they assumed led to other rooms like the one they were in. Through an immense archway at the end of the hall revealed an immense room, almost like the lobby of a large Hotel. Many aliens identical to their escort where floating around. Some of them were alone, others were escorting other aliens strapped to their own floating chairs, all wearing different clothes but were all noticeably wearing the same infantile garments Ben and Gwen were wearing. Some were sleeping, others were awake, some were even desperately trying to undo the straps that tied them down, irritated by their predicament.

Ben and Gwen came to a stop, being a part of a long line of other "babies" side-by-side.

"Gwen, what's going on?"

"I don't know."

"It's feeding time." Ben looked to his left, to find a feline-like violet furred aliens with pointed elf-like ears sitting next to him. He wore nothing but an orange shirt and a diaper, a striped racoon-like tail just barely peeking out between him and his seat. "I'm guessing you're new here."

"Yeah," responded Ben.

"Were is here?" Gwen asked.

"You don't know?" He asked. The humans shook their heads. "We're in the Galactic Nursery."

"Galactic NurMH!" As Ben's alien escort forced a spoonful of what he assumed was apple-sauce (given the taste) into his mouth. The same was being fed to Gwen by a different escort as the cat-like alien next to him excepted his bowl of a strange orange substance, complacent with his food. Ben tried asking the alien more, but more food was forced into his mouth every time he opened his mouth. While annoyed, he eventually stopped trying to fight it off.

"I am Young One," said the feline-like alien.

"Young Onmhm?" Said Gwen as food was shoved in her mouth.

'No. 'Young One'," the alien corrected.

"What kind of a name is Young One?" Asked Ben as he let more food in his mouth.

"On Revonnah, we do not get our names until we come of age when our tails fall off."

"...yeah," said Ben. Suddenly, all of their seats twitched as their escort aliens put away their empty bowls. Their seats began to move on their own as they were all taken...
11223111.title: The Galactic Nursury

choices: The three try and find a way out.
112231111.content:
All of the "babies" were taken to a large, padded room. It was full of a large variety of baby toys, some familiar, others too alien for Ben and Gwen to comprehend. There were four changing tables, one for each corner of the room. The ceiling was transparent, revealing that not only were they not on the planet Earth, they were actually orbiting it, the planet beautifully displayed before them.

"That's not good," Gwen remarked. Suddenly the two seats they were in vanished into thin air, the tow of them landing on their rears with a thump. With the padded floors mixed with the padding of their diapers

"Glad you could make it," said Young One. He was on his feet, having waited for them. His tail swished back and forth mindlessly, the alien seemingly unbothered by the fact that there was a large and noticeable yellow stain showing on the front of his diaper.

"Um, yeah," said Ben as the two humans got on their feet. "So where are we? Why are we here."

"The room we are in is the main kindergarten. We are suppose to spend our time playing with one another here."

"No, I mean why are we here," enunciated Ben.

"What doofus means is why exactly are we on a spaceship being treated like babies," asked Gwen.

"I do not know much, but from what some of the other prisoners here tell me, this ship was originally meant as a nursery and orphanage to wayward children across the galaxy."

"But we aren't orphans, and we aren't babies either," said Gwen. gesturing to her clothes.

"Nor am I," said Young One, "but something must have malfunctioned here. Now it acts erratically, taking recipients at random and caring for them as they should a set age."

"And the babysitters?" Asked Ben, gesturing to the floating aliens looking after the 'babies'.

"Synthesoids made for care-taking.," he answered flatly.

"Yeah, well I think its time that we left. See, our grandpa is probably wondering where we are and I really need to get back into my regular clothes," said Ben, inching his way to the nearest exit. Suddenly, two of the sythesoid aliens blocked his path. On of them poked him like before, causing Ben to seize up as he began to pee into the absorbent material of his diaper.

"There is no escaping," uttered Young One, almost as if he said it a million times already.

"But our planet just within reach," said Gwen, pointing to the Earth above them.

"Not for long. In 72 hours, the ship will move on and find somewhere else to do its job."

Ben struggled to stand, his body doing everything it can to expel the liquid in his bladder.

"Well, I'm not just going to stand here and be treated like a HEY!" As one of the aliens grabbed Ben, taking him to one of the nearest changing tables. The other alien grabbed Young One, who unlike Ben, put up no resistance.

"This is not good," said Gwen.
112231111.title: Meeting new friends

choices: Ben falls flat on his face.
Ben and Gwen Looks around the room, searching for a way out.
11223112.content:
The alien presence put Ben back onto the floor, sulking in the corner of his prison. The alien clasped its hands together and, in a flash, vanished into the ether.

Ben sat in the corner, staring down at the cream-colored stuffed rabbit sitting in front of him. His arms were crossed and he looked, to Gwen at least, like he would burst into tears at any moment from his moment of humiliation. He kept his legs close together, unconsciously blocking (or at least trying to block) his freshly changed diaper from Gwen's line of sight.

A thick, ugly silence wafted through the room like the smell of plastic and baby powder. Gwen crossed her arms over her frilly pink blouse and closed her eyes, struggling to remember what happened. She remembered that Ben, Grandpa Max and herself lying down to bed after saving the world from a Militia of Alien Triffids, same as every other day that summer. Then she remembered that the moment she fell asleep, a huge flash of light consumed the Rust Bucket.

Her thoughts were interrupted by a series of clicks and grunting noises. She looked up and saw Ben, taking out his pent up aggression at trying to use the Omnitrix. The cellophane-thick force-field over his watch prevented the watch from responding to his touch. His eyes looked up at her, his anger like fire.

"What are you looking at?!" Ben shouted. Gwen wanted to shout back at him like they always did, but that would have been counterproductive.

"I'm going to try something, but I'm not sure if this will work." Gwen crossed her legs, blushing as she heard the crinkling between her legs. She held her hands to her sides, and focused. Though she is a wonder with her spells, she was still a novice at using her newer powers, especially without her spell book. She breathed deeply through her nose, her eyes glowing blue, and spoke the incantation "Traer Acasa."

A flash of blue light filled the room for a second, receding into the caster as it finishes. Ben's eyes adjust, only to find that Gwen's wardrobe has chance, transformed into a large pink onsie with a kitten on her chest, the bulge of her diaper obvious. Ben would normally mock her, but he was not in the mood.

"What was that about?" Ben said.

"That was a teleportation spell! It was supposed to get us out of here!" She repeats the incantation again, only for her clothes to change eye again, wearing a white and pink similar to Dorothy from The Wizard of Oz (her diaper still completely obvious) and two little shoes on her feet. Her hair was tied into two little pigs tails. Even the room changed this time, more stuffed animals popping into the room, with a few foam blocks appearing strewn about. "Something about this place is messing with my magic. I don't know what to do." Gwen grabbed at her hair and undid her pigtails, unamused by the lapse in her powers.

"That's it!" Ben shouted, standing up and...
11223112.title: Alone again

choices: The girls search for the other Digidestined.
They decide to leave the villiage.
1131.content:
"Mimi! Mimi wake up!"

"Oh, just five more minutes mom."

Mimi was then shook violently awake. "Geez, alright. I'm up I'm up," she said as she pulled herself into a sitting position. Once she rubbed the sleep from her eyes she could see who had awoken her. "Sora? What's the problem?"

"The problem is I don't know where we are, and I don't see the others anywhere either."

"Wha-?" Mimi shot to her feet. Taking in her surroundings she could see the two of them were in the middle of a grassy field. "Okay, well it looks like we made it back to our world though right?"

"It does look like Earth, but I don't recognize the area. I don't see the trolly we were riding on though." The red-haired girl looked around a bit. "Hold on a second." before Mimi could object Sora was already half way up a tree.

"Sora! What are you doing?"

"I'm trying to get our bearings. See if there's anything- There!" She pointed her finger outward. "I can see a village or something over in that direction!"

"Mimi strained her eyes looking were Sora had pointed. "Are you sure?."

Sora slid down the trunk. "Sure I'm sure. If the others are anywhere nearby they'll probably be heading there too."

"Well I guess, but-"

"Come on!" Sora was already running on ahead.

"Huh? Sora! Wait for me!"

It only took a few minutes of running before the pair had reached the edge of the village. The place was bustling with activity. There were kids running al about the place, some two or three years older than they were, going down in age to five year olds and younger. They were all human, but there was one thing that immediately told the girls that something was not right.

"Sora?"

"Yeah?"

"Why is everyone wearing diapers?"

Sure enough every person they could see was wearing a diaper, either plainly visible or hidden underneath onesies or other baby clothes.

"I don't know, but I'm starting to think we may not be on Earth after all." As the pair examined the village they saw large toy blocks stacked in one area, a giant teddy bear not far off... "This entire place looks a lot like primary village back in the digital world."

That was when Mimi noticed a little girl was watching them quite intently. The girl wore nothing save t-shirt and a diaper. She nudged Sora and pointed her out. They exchanged glances then made their way over to her.

"Um, excuse me-" Mimi began.

"You dress funny," the girl giggled.

"Yeah, well we're not really from around here." Sora responded. "Where exactly is here?"

The girl looked at them, confused. "This is where here is."

Mimi was beginning to get frustrated. However she also had another problem. "Hey, could you please show me where the bathroom is?"

Again the girl responded with a blank stare. "What's a bath room?"
1131.title: Strange New World

choices: Sora puts on the training pants.
11311.content:
"What do you mean?" Mimi cried. "A bathroom is the place where you-" She stopped herself when she remembered the girl was wearing a diaper. "Never-mind."

Sora leaned over and to make herself level with the girl. "My name is Sora and this is Mimi. Can you tell us what your name is?"

The girl nodded. "I'm Joy."

Sora smiled. "Well Joy we're here looking for a group of friends of ours. There were four boys about our age and a boy and girl who are about three years younger than us. Have you seen anyone like that lately?"

Joy shook her head.

"Well Mimi and I got split up from the others so it's possible that the others are also-"

"You want some juice?" Joy held up what looked like a toddler's sippy cup.

"Er. no thanks. I'm not thirsty." Sora stood up. "Come on Mimi, we'd better get moving if we want to find anyone."

Mimi however was busy sniffing the air. "Sora, do you smell that?"

Sora moved closer and sniffed. "I think that's gingerbread."

"I wonder where it's coming..." Mimi trailed off. As Sora looked over she noticed a blank look on the girls face. Then she heard a strange noise.

"Mimi are you alright?" Sora moved closer and noticed the sound was coming from Mimi's crotch she looked down and saw a stream of urine running down Mimi's leg. "Mimi!" Sora reached out and put her hand on the girl. Mimi immediately came back to her senses.

"Sora. Did I just do what I think I did?" Sora nodded as Mimi began to tear up. "I don't know what happened! I suddenly had to go and I couldn't stop myself! My entire body just froze up!"

As Sora tried to calm down the girl Joy walked up and noticed Mimi's problem. "Whoops! Looks like someone has a leaky diaper!"

Before Mimi knew what was happening the Joy had taken a hold of her hand and was leading her to one of the buildings. "Don't worry. We'll get cleaned up in no time."

The building they walked into was painted with pastel blue with teddy bears on the outside. Inside the center of the room was occupied by what looked like two diaper changing tables, except they wee large enough to fit either of the older gils. One entire wall was covered by shelves that were filled to the brim with diapers of all shapes, sizes and colours.

Mimi however was too distraught to notice. Instead she did her best not to burst out crying. "Come on Mimi, don't worry about it." Sora said. "Just take off your dress and we'll get you into something dry."

Mimi nodded and began to undress. Her dress had not faired too badly, only having some pee on the front of the skirt. Soon she was wearing nothing but a bra and panties. Both pink. Her panties were absolutely soaked through and it was apparent that a good amount of urine had run down the inside of her legs. Joy looked at Mimi quizzically.

"Well no wonder you had a leak. That's the silliest looking diaper I've ever seen. There's no way something like that could hold any pee."

Mimi looked at the floor ashamed while Sora did her best to explain. "Joy that isn't a diaper. Where we come from we don't wear them."

"That doesn't make any sense. What do you do when you hafta pee? You'd get it all over your clothes."

Sora looked at the girl. "Joy, does everyone in this place wear diapers all the time?"

"Of course silly. What else would we wear?"

"Can't anyone here tell when they're going to pee and stop themselves?"

Joy giggled. "No silly. That's impossible." Sora sighed. It looked like that the concept of potty training was completely foreign to this place, wherever it was.

"Now don't you worry Mimi, I've got a real diaper for you this time." As she spoke Joy grabbed hold of a diaper from the shelf.

"Wait a minute. you're not going to put me in one of those things are you?" Mimi cringed.

"Mimi I don't think you have any choice. There's literally nothing else for you to wear."

Mimi looked down at her soaked panties and felt the material had soaked up all it could. "It's not fair!"

Sora tried to comfort the girl. "Look Mimi I think you'd better do it. You've already had one accident."

"That wasn't my fault!"

"I know. I think there's something in this place may have made you have that accident. This way if something happens again you won't get your dress all wet."

"But-" Mimi tried to think of something to say but she was still too embarrassed about the accident to think clearly.

"Come on, just take off your panties and lay down." Mimi nodded her panties dropped to the floor with a wet thud." Sora turned to Joy. "You know how to change a diaper right?"

"Of course! Everybody does!" Then she ran over to Mimi with the diaper in hand.

Sora turned her back to the pair, and ended up facing the wall of diapers. She thought about how Mimi wet herself without any warning. Maybe the same thing would happen to her too? She looked at all the diapers in front of her and wondered if she would be wearing one shortly. She investigated the shelves looking over all different kinds of diapers. Eventually she came to what looked like a pair of disposable training pants.

Sora thought to herself; should she put those on? If she had an accident she could take them off by herself as they didn't have tapes or anything like that. But was she really willing to put on a pair of pants designed for her to pee in?
11311.title: Mimi's accident

113111.content:
Sora walked out of the building and into the daylight. Underneath her jeans she wore a pair of training pants. It was embarrassing, but she was afraid she was going to have an accident like Mimi. Mimi, who now stood next to her, a diaper secured under her dress. She was the verge of tears.

“It’ll be okay Mimi. Once we find the others we can get away from this place.” Sora turned to Joy. “Joy, who can we talk to that might know where our friends might have gone?”

“Well, you could take to one of the town’s guards. They might know something,” Joy answered.

After walking for a while Joy pointed out what she identified as one of the town’s guards. He was a boy about Sora’s age who wore sandals and a helmet, and of course wore a diaper. He also carried a comically over-sized rattle.

After taking a breath Sora walked up to the boy. “Excuse me, um sir, but we’re looking for some friends of ours. We’re kind of new to this town you see, and we got separated.”

The boy looked her over for a few seconds. “New, huh? Well, not long ago we found a couple of boys just wandering town looking confused.”

“Oh, that might be them. Where are they?”

“Well, we took them to Lady Omutsu’s house of course.” Sora looked at him confused. “She lives in a mansion up that hill.” The boy pointed up a hill with his giant rattle.

“Thank you so much,” Sora bowed politely.

After a few minutes of walking the group could see the enormous mansion that the guard had said belonged to Lady Omutsu.

“This place is beautiful,” Mimi breathed. “Who is this lady Omutsu?” She asked of Joy.

“She’s only the most powerful person in town.”

“Well, if this is where our friends are we need to know,” Sora said defiantly.
113111.title: The house on the hill

choices: They try to escape through the window.
1131111.content:
Sora rang the bell and waited. It wasn’t long before the door opened to reveal a blond woman in her early twenties. She had on a diaper, which at this point wasn’t that surprising, and a piece of white cloth covering her breasts which was tied in a large bow behind her back. She had around her neck a key that she wore like a necklace.

“Lady Omutsu?” Sora asked.

“Can I help you girls with something?” she responded politely.

“I hope so,” Sora said. “You see we’ve been separated from our friends and we’ve heard that you’ve taken in a few boys who were new to the village.”

“Oh? You want to see my babies? Well then please come in.”

The woman led the group through the web furnished house and up a flight of stairs until she stopped at a door at the end of a hallway. Pulled the key from around her neck and used it to unlock the door, then she led the group inside.

The room was a nursery, but it seemed intended for someone much larger than a baby. The group wandered inside and Lady Omutsu was about to close the door behind them when a loud wailing could be heard. Someone was crying, but the noise was too deep to be coming from a baby.

“Oh, that’s my little one. He must have just woke up from his nap. I’m sorry but he really needs his mommy. You can say hi to my other baby boy if you like. I’ll just be a minute.” Then Lady Omutsu left the room, closing the door behind her.

“This house is weird,” Mimi whispered to Sora.

“This whole town is weird.” Sora walked up to the crib and peered over to see a sleeping figure inside. Unable to see who it was under the blanket she gently prodded it. The figure stirred and rolled over reviewing Tai’s face.

“Tai!? Tai! Wake up!” Sora urged, shaking the boy fiercely. Soon the boy opened his eyes.

“Sora? Is that you?” All at once Tai seemed to fully wake up. “Oh man am I glad to see you!” Tai threw off the covers and stood up in the crib. “Izzy and I found ourselves in this weird town and when we went to this house asking for help this crazy lady took us in. She made us wear-“ Tai stopped abruptly and looked down at himself. He was wearing a t-shirt and a diaper, and nothing else. His cheeks turned red and he tried to cover his diaper with his hands. “I, um-”

“No, Tai it’s okay," Mimi said stepping forward. “This entire town is like diaper central. In fact Sora’s wearing one too.”

Tai looked over at Sora. “You are?”

Sora wanted to correct Mimi and say she was wearing training pants, but didn’t have the heart to. “Yes, I am. And so is Mimi.”

Mimi folded her arms looking cross. “Tattletale.”

Tai seemed to be feeling a little better. “Okay. Can you help me out of this crib?”

With help from Sora and Mimi, Tai was soon out of is crib and standing next to the girls. Joy walked up to him and offered a her hand. “Hi. I’m Joy.”

“Tai,” the boy said shaking her hand. “Can we get out of here now?”

“Didn’t you say Izzy was with you?” Sora asked.

“Oh, right. We have to help him too. That lady did something strange to him.”

“Well, let’s get going then.” Sora made for the door and turned the knob. At least she tried to, but the knob wouldn’t budge. “Uh-oh guys. I think we’re locked in.”

The group stood in silence. Fortunately Tai stepped forward and, with a smile announced, "I have a plan."
1131111.title: Lady Omutsu

11311111.content:
“Tai.”

“Shh. She’s coming.”

Sora and the other three were hiding under a pile of stuffed animals in a corner of the room. It was not what one would call comfortable. Tai’s diapered rear was too close to Sora’s face for her liking.

She could not see the door open, what with Tai’s diaper being in the way, but she could hear it. All at once Tai’s diaper lept forward and began pressing itself into Sora’s face. She did her best not to make a noise.

“Where are you my babies?” the voice of Lady Omutsu sang out. “Are you hiding from me?” There was a pause before she spoke again. “Could you be hiding in the closet?” A second later Sora could hear her open the closet. She waited, then...

“Now!” Tai said under his breath.

The group of four left out from under the pile of stuffed animals. Tai, the first one up, ran to the closet and closed it, using his body to bar it shut. Sora, Mimi and Joy ran to the nursery door. Once they were outside Tai abandoned his position at the closet and ran through the door. When he was through Sora slammed the door shut and locked it.

“Oh, you naughty babies! Open this door, or Momma will be very cross with you!”

“I don’t think so,” Mimi said. “Let’s go.”

The group began moving down the hallway when they heard that crying again.

“That’s Izzy!” Tai exclaimed.

“She got izzy too?” Sora responded.

“Yeah. We came here to ask for help, then that lady started doing some weird stuff to us. It’s a little fuzzy.”

Mimi followed the wailing down the hall, then waved the others over. Zeroing in on the crying they soon found its source. Through another door was another nursery, very similar to the one Tai had been in. Lying on the floor in the middle of the room was Izzy, crying, dressed in nothing but a diaper.

“Izzy!” Tai cried out, running to the red-haired boy. Izzy stopped crying as Tai pulled Izzy into a sitting position. “It’s good to see you buddy!”

Izzy looked at Tai and gurgled.

“Hey, Izzy! Come on, we’ve got to go.”

Izzy responded with indecipherable baby babble.

“Tai, I think there’s something wrong with him,” Sora said.

“Izzy, please,” Tai pleaded. Sora approached the pair and put her hand on Tai’s shoulder. “He’s acting like a baby. Something that lady did made him-“ Tai’s eyes shot open and he stood straight up.

“Tai? What’s wrong?”

“Nothing,” Tai answered, but it was clear what the problem was. Tai began dancing on the spot and crossing his legs.

“Tai, do you have to pee?”

“No,” Tai whimpered. A second later he let out an exasperated sigh. “Yes. I just don’t want to wet my diaper. I’m not a baby.” But then a whizzing sound erupted from Tai’s nether regions. Sora could both hear Tai peeing, and see the yellow spot on the front of Tai’s diaper grow and grow.
11311111.title: Hide and Seek

113111111.content:
“No. This isn’t supposed to happen,” Tai muttered as he wet his diaper. He fought back tears as Sora watched on.

“Tai, it’s okay. It’s not you, it’s this place,” Sora said trying to comfort the boy.

“Why is he crying?” Joy asked. “It’s just a wet diaper.”

Mimi stepped forward. “Let’s just grab Izzy and go, before that crazy lady comes back.”

“Oh, so I’m crazy now am I?”

The group turned to see Lady Omutsu standing in the doorway.

“But how?” Tai questioned. “We locked you in that room.”

“Yes, you succeeded in locking me in a room that I have the key to,” she said bringing her hand up to the key she wore around her neck. “You’ve all been bad little babies. Maybe you’ll all be more compliant after you get whatever it is out of your system.”

The woman began humming softly. The children were confused at first, then they all felt it. Each one of them felt the overpowering urge to poop.

Joy didn’t seem to mind at all. Without a whimper of complaint she was happily pooping her diaper. Izzy still lay on the floor and soiled himself while cooing. The other three put up more of a fight however. They each danced around on the spot trying to avoid the urge to release their bowels.

“Please, don’t do this,” Tai begged. “We’re not supposed to- ugh!” Tai bent over and held his stomach as he began depositing his load into this diaper.

Mimi rushed at Lady Omutsu and the older woman grabbed her. Holding Mimi in place she failed to catch Sora as she ran past.

Sora ran down the hallway and darted into a room to hide. She closed the door behind her and unbuttoned her jeans, letting them fall to the floor. She was not going to poop in her pants. Looking at the training pants she wore, she pulled them down as well.

All of a sudden the urge to poop was completely gone. Experimentally she pulled the training pants back up. As soon as they were in place the urge to poop returned. Again Sora pulled them down and the urge left her. “That must be how she’s making us soil ourselves. These diapers and training pants, by wearing them we’re letting her control when we go to the bathroom.”

“What a clever girl you are.”

Sora heard the voice behind her and froze. She tried to run, but her pants were still around her ankles and she tripped, falling forward and hitting the ground. Still trying to get away she began to crawl, but she realized she had nowhere to go and turned onto her back so she could see Lady Omutsu approach her.

"The others are safely locked away. Your friends and their dirty diapers won't be going anywhere. The questions remains: What do we do with you?"
113111111.title: Caught

1131111111.content:
“Don’t worry baby, mama will look after you now.” Lady Omutsu approached the girl. Looking down at the clothing around her ankles she said, “Oh, what’s this? These training pants were never going to hold in a mess sweetie. Here, let me fix this.”

The woman approached Sora, who backed up until she was against the wall. Sora wanted to move, but her body went numb once Lady Omutsu started humming. Sora was forced to watch as Lady Omutsu pulled off her jeans and training pants. “Now let’s make sure you don’t make a mess.” Placing her hands on her diaper Lady Omutsu pulled off one tape, then the other, and her diaper came free. "I haven’t used it yet, so you can, my darling.” She kneeled in front of Sora and proceed to diaper the poor girl.

“Please, stop this. My friends and I aren’t babies,” Sora pleaded.

“You keep saying that. What exactly does it mean?" Omustu finished her work. "There we go. Now you have a nice comfy diaper on.”

“Fine. Then let me get up.”

“Oh, no. You have proven to be quite naughty. I’m going to have to do something to make you more agreeable.” Lady Omutsu reached behind her and undid the sash that held her top on. Sora watched as it fell to the floor, then looked up at Lady Omutsu’s breasts.

“No. You can’t.”

“Of course I can dear. I already fed your friend Izzy and look how much happier he is now.” Lady Omutsu approached Sora and picked up the girl like she weighed nothing. She moved over a chair and sat down.

“I'm not-“ but before she could get another word out Sora found a nipple in her mouth. A squirt of milk came out and suddenly her mouth started moving on its own, greedily sucking on the woman’s teat.

“See, it’s not so bad.”

Sora wanted to stop, but found she couldn’t. The milk filled her mouth and she had to swallow. When she did, she could feel the warm milk as it ran down her throat. As she continued to suckle a strange sensation washed over her body. All at once her feelings of apprehension had vanished, replaced by calm. Next came a warmth from her loins. It took Sora a moment to realize she was peeing, but the sensation felt wonderful. She actually wished she had more urine in her just so she wouldn’t have to stop peeing.

“There we go. A nice wet diaper. Doesn’t that feel nice?” Lady Omutsu pressed her hand against Sora’s diaper and she felt the wet fabric push up against her. Sora was finally able to let go of the woman’s breast and fell back. “Halfway there deary. How do you feel?”

Sora tried to speak, but it took more effort than she was expecting. Her mouth just made uncoordinated babble.

“I thought as much. Hard to concentrate isn’t it? You could probably say a word or two if you really tried.”

“St- stop,” Sora finally managed.

“I don’t think so. Once you're finished sucking on my other breast your ability to speak will be totally gone and you’ll find you won’t even be able to think. I’ll know you're done when you make a big poopy for me.”

“Poopy?”

“Yes. You and your friends were so opposed to it, though I can’t imagine why. Of course they all filled their diapers, now it’s your turn.”

“No. Be good.”

“Oh, now you want to behave?” The woman considered this for a moment. “Mm. Tell you what, I'm going to put you down and get dressed. If I walk around without a diaper on for very long I'm sure to pee on the floor. I bet you didn't even realize you hid in my own room did you?"

Lady Omutsu sat up and carefully placed Sora down on the floor, then walked over to a dresser and opened it. As she sat on her new poofy diaper, Sora could see inside the dresser. It was filled with baby clothes and diapers.

“You and your friends really don’t like the thought of making messes in your diapers. It’s strange.” Lady Omutsu took a diaper from her dresser and walked over to the room’s changing table. "Having a dirty diaper isn't as bad as you make it out to be."

The warm feeling had started to fade and Sora found it easier to think. Lady Omutsu had said that she’d poop herself once she had more milk. Then she’d end up like Izzy, and she didn’t want that. Still watching Lady Omutsu she saw her sit down on the edge of her changing table and slide the diaper under her bottom. She had to do something fast.

Sora reached down and felt her diaper. It was much thicker than the training pants she had been wearing earlier. On top of that, her diaper was wet, still warm from her pee. It was a strange sensation.

"Perhaps this is for the best. Now that you've had a taste of my milk, maybe you'll be more co-operative. So, I'll make a deal with you. I'm going to ask you some questions about you and your friends. There seem to be quite a few of you, and I'd like to know more about your little group. Like exactly how many of you there are. I want to know everyone's names and what they look like. If you play nice then I won't give you more milk. But if you're a bad girl, then I'll feed you so much milk that you won't even be able to sit up."

Lady Omutsu got down from the changing table. She was wearing a fresh disposable diaper. "So, what's it going to be little girl?"

Sora thought about this for a moment. She didn't want to drink any more milk, but neither did she want to tell this crazy woman all about her friends.
1131111111.title: Sora's Meal

11312.content:
"Sora, I'm not sure I like this place," Mimi announced.

"Yeah, I know what you mean. Maybe we'd better get out of here."

"You're leaving?" the small girl asked. "Why would you want to go?"

"Well for starters you don't have a bathroom," Mimi mumbled to herself.

"We just have some place we need to be," Sora finished.

The small girl looked concerned. "But it's not safe outside the village."

Sora smiled and said, "Don't worry. We can look after ourselves."

The two girls waved goodbye to the child and retreated from the village. Soon they were on the outskirts of the settlement.

Mimi wrapped her arms around herself. "That place was creepy,"

"Yeah. Something about that place was just wrong. And the way everyone was dressed like a baby didn't help matters."

"So what do we do about finding the others?"

Sora thought about that for a moment. "Let's go back to the spot where we first arrived and see if we can find a clue about what happened before we woke up."

Several minutes later the two girls found themselves back in the grassy field. Sora declared "I don't see any sign of the streetcar we were riding in."

"Um, Sora, could you give me a minute?" Mimi asked while shifting from one foot to the other. "I kind of need to go."

"Oh sure. I'll be right here."

With that Mimi walked off. Sora tried to remember what had happened after they had all left the Digital world on their trip back home, but nothing came to her. Them she heard Mimi screaming. Sora turned to see Mimi running towards her.

"Mimi! What's wrong?"

"That's what's wrong!" Mimi pointed at the direction she had come from and Sora saw the problem.

About a dozen kids came towards them all riding big wheels, small plastic tricycles with an oversized front tire. At least they were usually small. The ones these kids were riding were big enough for either of the girls to ride. Most of the kids riding the big wheels were about their age, though some were smaller. The gang began riding in a giant circle around the two girls and Sora got a good look at the riders. Just like in the village everyone was wearing diapers and baby clothes.

The circle of big wheels stopped moving and one of the older boys called out to them. "Well well, what do we have here?" The boy's black hair was moulded into one giant pointed cone that was sticking straight up. He wore only a diaper and what looked to be a leather jacket. He took out a pacifier and began to suck on it it in such a way that it looked like he was taking a drag on a cigarette.

"You girls are dressed pretty funny," the lead boy said as he leaned forward on his handlebars. "You don't look like you're from around here."

"We're not," Sora announced confidently.

The boy put the pacifier in his mouth again and took two big long sucks on it. "Well, then I think it's only proper that we welcome you to the neighborhood."
11312.title: Big wheels, big problems

choices: Ken has to use his diaper.
Ken asks the others to spank him.
1132.content:
It was a sunny day in Primary Villiage when the Digidestined arrived.

"Why do we have to go see a bunch of babies?" Davis asked.

"Show some respect Davis," T.K. said. "Primary Village is where digimon come when they get destroyed. Some of these guys have gone through some pretty rough times."

"I guess some are probably victims of Ken when he was still the Digimon Emperor huh?" Yolei said.

"Yeah. They would be," Kari answered.

Just then T.K. spotted someone. "Hey Elecmon!" He ran ahead towards the red digimon as he was coming out of a small hut.

"Hi there T.K. Long time no see." Elecmon answered. The other children ran up to T.K. and Elecmon. "I'm actually glad you kids are here. There's something I think you should see."

Cody wondered aloud, "Really? What kind of something?"

Elecmon gave a devilish grin. "Okay, come out here little boy."

Out of the hut stepped Ken Ichijouji. Though all of the children were surprised by what he was wearing. He had on a dark blue onesie. It had no legs but did have snaps on the front of the crotch. And he was sucking on a pacifier.

"Ken? Is that you?" Davis asked.

Ken muttered something unintelligible through the pacifier. Realizing the mistake he took it out. "Uh. Yeah it's me."

Yolei stepped forward "Why are you dressed like that?"

"It's kind of, complicated." Ken's face was a bright shade of red.

"Complicated how?" T.K. asked.

"Well, I feel really bad about hurting all those digimon back when I was the emperor. The ones who I hurt the worst wound up here in Primary Village as baby digimon."

Elecmon stepped forward. "A lot of the babies were upset about being reformatted and thought Ken here should feel what it's like."

Ken nodded. "It's the least I could do."

Davis looked confused. "So what exactly do you mean by that?"

Ken looked away. "Elecmon here is going to treat me like a baby as part of my punishment. That means I drink out of a bottle and, other things'"

Yolie blink a few times before asking, "Wait. Ken, are you wearing a diaper?"

Ken swallowed and began to undo the snaps on his onesie. When he was done he pulled up the onesie so everyone could see that he was wearing a thick disposable diaper.

"Geez man," Davis said, "That's just weird."

"And Elecmon is making you do all this? "T.K. glanced over at the digimon.

"Well, it was mostly his idea. But he isn't making me do anything. I feel terrible about the things I did and I need to be punished. Not just so the digimon I've hurt can have justice, but because I feel that I SHOULD be punished for what I've done. I need this."

"And you've decided the most fitting way to be punished is by wearing a diaper?" Cody asked.

"Considering many of my victims are wearing them now it seemed appropriate." Ken answered. "I feel awful about what I've done, especially to Wormmon, so I need to feel shame."
1132.title: Primary Village

choices: The other Tamers find him like this.
Takato has a sudden urge to poop.
1133.content:
"Peekaboo!" The strange dog creature sprung into the little Kuromon's field of view causing it to giggle. It was too young to understand that it was just a decorated sock being worn by Jeri.

"This place is really amazing." Henry said kneeling down in front of another group of newborn digimon. "I would have never expected to see so many baby digimon in one place."

Hery looked up at the female Hanumon that had greeted them. "That is the point of Nursury town. We can protect the baby digimon better if we keep them together in one place. It is a lot of work looking after all these little ones, but it is a very important task. After all, these digimon are our future."

Henry stood up. "Well, we really appreciate you taking the time to show us around."

"Yeah, just as long as we stop the tour before we ge to the place where you keep all the dirty diapers."

"Terriermon!"

Rika walked past Kenta and Kazu as they argued about whether the Punimon they were looking at was a boy or a girl. "Hey, did anyone see where Goggle-boy ran off to?"
