Henry shook his head. "I haven't seen Guilmon around either. Knowing those two they probably went to get something to eat."

-----

"Takatomon I'm hungry!"

"Yeah, I'm hungry too but I can't find anything to eat."

Guilmon wandered off. Soon his nose picked up something. "Takatomon, I smell something." Soon enought the pair were standing in front of a door. Takato reached out and turned the knob, surprised that the door wasn't locked or anything. Once inside he took note of what they had discovered.

"It's just a bunch of baby bottles." Indeed the enitre room was filled with counters that had nothing but baby bottles inside them.

Guilmon ignored him and picked one up with his claws. It was full of milk but he couldn't see any way to get at it.

"Guilmon, put that down. You're not a baby are you?" It was at that moment that Takato's stomach growled. "Well, I guess a little bit won't hurt." He took the bottle from Guilmon and tried to screw off the top. He had no succes and soon gave up. Looking down at the rubber nipple Takato got an idea. Carefully he looked around to make sure no one was watching him, then he put the nipple in his mouth and began to suck.

Immediatley Takato was overwelmed by the flavour that hit his tongue. It was the most delicious thing he had ever tasted in his life!

"Does it taste good?" Guilmon looked the boy square in the face. Takato however was completely oblivious to everything around him. He continued to suck from the bottle as a warm feeling engulfed his entire body. Feeling a little woozy Takato sat down on the floor downing milk the entire time.

"Are you okay Takatomon?" Guilmon was starting to feel a bit worried about his partner. Takato however had never felt so relaxed. He was so at ease in fact that he barely noticed when his bladder relaxed and a stream of urine poured out into his underwear. Soon Takato was sittng in a pair of urine soaked pants. Still he didn't care. In fact the feeling of warmth down in his neather regions made him feel even better and he pushed out more and more urine just to make the feeling last longer.

Finally Takato emptied the last of the milk from the bottle. He pulled the bottle from his mouth and let out a burp.

"That was great! Guilmon, you really need to try some of-" That's when Takato noticed that he was sitting on the floor with soaking wet pants. Takato jumped to his feet. Or at least he tried. As soon as he was off the floor he fell down again. Using a nearby counter for support Takato climbed to his feet. He could stand, but his balance was compromised somehow and he had a difficult time remaining steady.

"Guilmon I feel kind of funny..." Without thinking Takato put his thumb in his mouth and began sucking on it. He wasn't sure why but it made him feel better.
1133.title: Takato and the Digi-milk

11331.content:
"Hey guys, I think I found Takato." Kenta called out.

"You think?" Rika mocked. "What, aren't you sure?"

"I honestly don't even know."

The other tamers followed Kenta's voice and walked in on quite a sight. Takato was sitting on the floor, his legs splayed out and his pants soaked with urine. On top of that his thumb was planted in his mouth and he was sucking on it.

While the others stared dumbfounded Henry walked up to Takato and knelt down. "Takato, are you okay?" Without removing his thumb the boy nodded in affirmative. "Can you tell me what happened?"

Takato pulled the thumb from his mouth and answered. "Me and Guilmon were walking round and gotst hungry. Guilmon found a ba-ba and I drank out of it." Takato statred to tear up slightly at the next part. "Then I went pee-pee."

Henry could only respond by blinking. This was strange, even by Takato standards.

"What is all this fuss about?" The female Hanumon walked into the room. Her reyes immediatly settled on Takato. "Oh my. Did someone have an accident?"

Henry picked up the empty bottle by Takato's side and stood up. "Takato drank from this bottle and now he's acting really weird."

The Hanumon walked over to Takato and effortlessly picked him up. "You poor thing. Let's get you cleaned up and into something dry." Without another word Hanumon walked out of the room wih Takato cradled in her arms.

The others were left alone and completely dumbfounded. Henry turned to the others. "What do you guys think?"

Renamon was the first to respond. She glided over to Henry and took the bottle from him. "This milk was made for baby digimon to drink. Who knows what effects it mught have on a human?"

"I think Takato has a pretty good idea," Terriermon piped up.

"Do you think he's in any danger?" Jeri asked.

Renamon shook her head. "No. I think Takato's just a little dissoriented from drinking all this milk."

"Come on now, there's no need to be shy. We're only going to see your friends."

Hanumon's voice could be heard approaching them. The group turned their attention to the doorway and saw Hanumon leading Takato by the hand. As soon as the boy was in view Terriermon, Kenta and Kazu burst into laughter while Rika covered her mouth with her hands.

Takato now had a pacifier in his mouth which he sucked on constantly. His pants and shoes had been removed and he was wearing a very thick diaper between his legs. As the others laughed at him Takato tried to hide behind Hanumon.

Kazu started to jeer, "I guess Rika was right. You are just a big baby!"

Kenta whispered into Kazu's ear. "No, Rika called US big babies, remember?"

Terriermon made a remark about Takato being the snappiest dresser in nursury school.

"Stop that right now!" Hanumon cried out. The laughing quickly died down. "Your friend has had a bad day and he doesn't need you making fun of him."

"Takatomon?" Guilmon walked up to his tamer and began sniffing at his diaper.

Jeri stepped foward and observed Takato's new attire. "Is the diaper really neccesary?"

"He's had one accident already. No reason to risk another."

Henry had to ask. "Do you know what's wrong with him? Is this permanent?"

Hanumon chuckled. "There's nothing to worry about. He just drank something he shouldn't have. This milk is for digimon, not humans. He's just a little out of sorts right now because the milk is making him behave like a baby. I'm sure it's only temporary."

"That's a relief." Henry though for a minute. "Exactly how temporary?"

"Days? Months? I don't know anything about human biology so I really can't say."

Henry swallowed. Months?
11331.title: Baby Takato

choices: The tamers try to stop Takato's crying.
113311.content:
Henry continued to talk to Hanumon.

"You had somewhere to go?" the digimon asked.

"Yes. And this whole thing with Takato really puts a diaper- I mean a damper on our rescue plans."

Jeri took hold of Takato's hand and helped him down into a sitting position. Kenta and Kazu approached their friend, Kazu being the first to speak. "Hey Takato. You still in there guy?" Takato only responded by nodding.

"Here, let's take this out of your mouth for a minute." Very gently Jeri removed the pacifier from Takato's mouth. "There. Now do you think you can talk?"

"Couse I can talk. I's a big boy."

The two boys looked at each other for a moment before they burst into a fit of giggles. "Cut it out you two!" Jeri ordered.

"Sorry, sorry," Kenta said as they quieted down.

Guilmon approached his tamer and began to nuzzle the boy. Takato then felt a weird sensation, like something was pushing up against his butt. He turned around to see Terriermon was pressing against his diaper. "Wow, look at how soft and fluffy this thing is," he said giving it a squeeze.

"Terriermon stop bothering Takato," Henry ordered.

"Ah, lighten up Henry. I just wanted to get a good look at our new baby."

Henry was going to chastise his digimon, until he came up with a better idea. "Maybe you just want to wear a diaper again. Is that it?"

The three children all looked at Terriermon as he began to blush. "What do you mean, 'wear a diaper again?'" Jeri asked.

Henry smiled devilishly. "Oh, nothing. It's just that back home my little sister thought Terriermon was a doll, so she'd play Princess Pretty Pants with him whenever she got the chance."

"Henry stop!" Terriermon begged.

"Princess Pretty Pants?" Kenta asked dumbfounded.

"Oh sure. Suzy would dress him up in a bib and a diaper and even give him a pacifier to suck on. Then she'd carry him round the hou-mph!" Henry's voice became muffled as Terriermon jumped on his shoulder and used his big ears to cover up his mouth.

Takato wasn't paying attention to any of this however. Instead he was waving at Rika.

"I think he wants to see you," Renamon observed.

"What do you say to a 10-year old boy wearing a diaper?"

"Why don't we go find out?" Renamon put her hand on Rika's back and pushed as the two made their way forward.

At first Rika put up a slight struggle, telling Renamon to stop as they walked towards the others. Soon enough the pair were standing right in front of the small group and Rika noted she was making a scene. Her face just a little red she stepped forward on her own. "Um... Hi Takato." She felt like a fool standing there trying to have a conversation with Takato while he sat in front of her wearing that diaper.

Then without warning Takato let out a loud belch. When he finished there was a line of snot dripping out of his nose.

"Augh. That's just disgusting." Rika pronounced.

"It's not that bad," Jeri responded as she began wiping Takato's face.

"Whatever you say. Just don't expect me to help clean him up if he has another accident."

Takato blinked. "What kina acceydent?" Then, upon looking downwards Takato noticed his feet and promptly began trying to suck on his toes.

Rika brought her hand to her face. "This is just embarrassing.

"Come on Rika. Cut the guy some slack." Henry said.

"Cut him some slack?" Rika pointed at the diapered boy. "Takato's acting like a baby! Well, more than usual anyway. Just look at him!" She pointed her finger at Takato, who by this point had rolled onto his back, still trying to put his toes in his mouth. "He can barely talk, he puts everything in his mouth and he's already wet himself once. It's obvious where this is going and I really don't feel like playing nursemaid right now!"

"Geez, Rika, don't have a cow." Kazu replied. "Takato will be fine, he just needs to sleep it off. RIght?"

Jeri looked over worriedly at Takato. After helping him back into an upright position she tried to talk with him. "Takato. Do you remmebr who I am?"

Takato giggled. "Don'd be siwwy. Yous Jewi."

That brought a smile to her face. "Good, you still remember me. How do you feel? Can you stand up?" Takato tried to stand up on his own but fell onto his butt almost immediately. "Well, that answers that. Takato can you-"

Before she could go any further a loud fart erupted from within Takato's diaper. Everyone in attendance exchanged worried looks. Henry was the first to speak. "You don't think he..."

Cautiously Jeri moved over to Takato's rear, put her finger within the waistband of his diaper and pulled it back. Peeking inside all she could see was the inside lining of the diaper and Takato's bum. "No, he's clean."

An audible sigh of relief went up. "Great. Now if you'll excuse me I'm going to get out of here before he poops himself for real."

"Rika, what is your problem?" Henry asked.

"My problem? My problem is that we've come all the way to the digital world and instead of doing what we came here to do now we have to look after dumb baby Takato." By now Rika had began to raise her voice and had everyone's full attention, including Takato. "What if we run into some unfriendly digimon? Do you think they'll just stop in the middle of a battle and let us change Takato's diaper? Or maybe if he poops himself enough the smell will be enough to scare away our enemies."

By this point the loud noises were beginning to upset Takato. "Rika," Jeri said, "I think you'd better stop."

But RIka just ignored her. "And frankly I don't see how a bunch of ten year old kids are going to be able to look after a baby anyhow. Especially not one as big as Takato."

Takato really didn't like all this yelling. He just wanted it all to stop, but it wouldn't. So he did the only thing he could think of. He cried.

Everyone immediately covered their ears. "Great job Rika," Henry scolded. "Now you made him cry!"
113311.title: Rika upsets Takato

choices: Rika is turned into a motherly figure.
1133111.content:
Hanumon, upset at Rika's behavior, grabbed her by her shoulders. "I want you to apologize to poor Takato right now!"

The human girl struggled, breaking free from Hanumon's grip. "Why should I apologize?! All I said was that Takato is a baby! Just look at him! All he's doing now is crying like one!"

Takato didn't like all the shouting and cried louder, loosening his bowels and making a fart loud enough to stop all the shouting. Everyone was quickly noticed the smell emanating from the boy's diaper.

"Now see what he's done! This just proves my point that Takato is nothing more than a BIG BA....." Rika stopped as a baby bottle found its way into her open mouth. She looked at Hanumon and saw that she was holding it in place. A tiny drop of milk found its way onto Rika's tounge. The taste was so wonderful Rika began sucking from the bottle before her brain could process what was happening.

"Maybe this will teach you to have a little more compassion for you friends."
1133111.title: Hanumon becomes upset with Rika

choices: Rika turns Henry into a baby out of anger
Takato wakes up and starts playing with the Tamers.
1133112.content:
As time went on Takato's crying became unbearable, so the other Tamers set to work trying to stop his crying.

Jeri tried to cheer him up with her sock puppet but he only rustled it off her hand and threw it to the side forcing her to run after it. Kazu and Kenta tried making funny faces but that only made him cry louder.

"Will someone please shut him up already!" Terriermon yelled over Takato's wailing, wrapping his ears into a bow to try and drown out the sound. Guilmon followed by covering his ears as did Renamon.

Rika only stood by in silence, as did Hanumon. She didn't know what to do. She was only experienced in dealing with Digimon babies.

"I can't believe I'm about to do this" Henry sighed, sitting down next to the screaming Tamer, gently grabbing him by the shoulders and pulled him to rest on his chest and started to softly sing in his ear.

Little child be not afraid, the rain pounds harsh against the glass
Like an unwanted stranger, there is no danger I am here tonight
Little child be not afraid, though thunder explodes and lightning flash
Illuminates your tear stained face, I am here tonight
And someday you'll know that nature is so
This same rain that draws you near me, fall on rivers and land and forest and sand
Makes the beautiful world that you see, in the morning

About halfway through the shakedown Cagalli suddenly felt a strange sensation in her lower abdomen. She didn’t know what it was at first. Then all at once the realization hit her. She had to poop.

Cagalli had never felt the urge come on so fast before. She tried her best to stop herself, but her bowels had a mind of their own and Cagalli was helpless as her body deposited a large mass of mushy poop into the seat of her diaper.

Cagalli could feel tears start to well up in her eyes. The muck down below felt sticky against her bottom. She could not believe what she had just done. She wanted to get away from the mess in her pants, but she couldn’t. She was in a confined cockpit with nowhere to go. This was her mess. It came from inside her and she would have to live with it, at least until she could get her diaper changed.
115211.title: Diapered Princess

choices: Meer panics and tries to get out of using her diapers.
1153.content:
Never before in her life had she been so groggy. It was a struggle just to open her eyes. The minute she did though she snapped them shut again. The light seemed so bright.

"Miss Campbell, are you awake?"

That voice, it was a doctor wasn't in? Meer turned her head towards the voice and opened her eyes just a crack. When she could focus she could make out what appeared to be a doctor.

"Good. How do you feel?" Meer could only moan in response. "That's to be expected after the surgery. Give it some time and I'm sure you'll feel better." As soon as the man was finished Meer fell asleep again.

It was an hour later the girl woke up, this time in the presence of a familiar face. Sitting next to her bed was a man with short blond hair.

"I see you're awake again. How do you feel Meer? Can you talk?"

This time Meer had much more strength and was able answer. "Yes. I think so."

"Good. Now I know you've just had some major surgery so I want to make sure you know what's going on. Now, who am I?"

Meer though that sounded silly. At least she would have if she wasn't still so groggy. "You're Louis, you agreed to help train me after the surgery."

"Right. Now do you remember what the surgery was for?"

Meer nodded. "Yes. It was an operation to make me look exactly like Lacus Clyne." She closed her eyes. Then, all at once she seemed to remember something. "OH! A Mirror! I need to see-"

Louis already had a mirror in his hand. Meer anxiously looked into it. "Oh my! This is incredible! I look exactly like miss Lacus!"

"Yes, and if I do my job right you'll be able to act like her too."

Meer sat up. It was a struggle but she managed to do it. Letting the covers fall off her she could see she was wearing a hospital gown. Something felt off though. She could swear she was sitting on something. She felt around with her hands and discovered that underneath the gown she was naked. Naked except for one thing.

"Am I wearing a diaper?" Meer began to blush. "I guess I was under a lot of medication and they didn't want me to wet the bed."

"That's only part of the reason." Meer looked at him confused. "I'm not sure if you're aware of this but Lacus Clyne is completely incontinent."

Meer let out a slight gasp. "Really? I had heard a rumour or two about something like that but I never really paid it any mind."

"Yes, well, as you are now going to be impersonating miss Clyne we need you to behave exactly like her at all times."

Meer thought about this for a moment. "Wait. Are you saying..."

"Yes Meer. Part of your training will include learning to use your diapers. We need every aspect of your appearance to match Lacus' as close as possible."

Meer swallowed. Use her diaper? She didn't like the sound of that. Louis seemed to sense her apprehension. "Don't worry Meer. I know this seems really intimidating right now but by the time we're through it will all be fine. Remember, Lacus wears diapers all the time too. She pees and poops in them everyday without thinking about it. It doesn't bother her at all and soon enough it won't bother you either."

"Did somebody call for me?" A small voice came from in front of them. Looking head the trio watched as they were approached by a little girl of about six years of age. She was wearing a sun dress, and held a lollipop in her hand which she was licking. The girl was accompanied by an Alakazam.

Brock tried to get ash's attention "Ash, I'm pretty sure that's not-"

"Yes I did! My name is Ash Ketchem and I challenge you to a Pokemon battle!"

That got the girl's attention. "Yay! Another fwiend for Auwowa!" She started jumping up and down. "Okay Alakazam! Take us to the battle woom!"

The Alakazam's eyes lit up and in an instant the trio were standing on the edge of a Pokemon arena. Looking around Ash could see giant stuffed Teddiursa, candy cane shaped posts and giant lollipops sticking out of the ground. The girl and the Alakazam were at the opposite end.

"Hangs on fow a minute. I needs to get changed." Again the Alakazam's eyes lit up and the girl was lifted into the air. Her dress was removed, as were her socks and shoes. Soon she was naked except for her white underwear. Then a pink baby tee was placed over her and she was set back on the floor.

"All weady now." The girl happily skipped towards the arena. "We's gonna have a one-on-one Pokemon battle. Okay?!"

"Fine by me!" Ash nodded to Pikachu and it ran into the center of the arena. "I choose Pikachu!"

"Yay!" The girl's eyes lit up and a poke ball floated into the center of the arena. Then I choose Smoochy!" The pokeball opened and a Smoochum appeared. There was something strange about this Smoochum though.

"Wait a minute. Is that Smoochum wearing a diaper?"

The girl giggled. "Of couwse she is dummy. Smoochy's not potty twained yet. Just like me!"

"Huh!?" Looking closer Ash could see that the girl wasn't wearing underwear like he thought. She was wearing a diaper!

"What kind of a Gym Leader wears diapers?" Ash said aloud.

"I'm not Gym Weader silly! I'm Auwowa. And when I win you hasta be my fwiend!"

"I don’t like where this is going." Ash muttered.

"I told you this wasn't the Fuchsia gym!" Misty shouted angrily.

For whatever reason Pikachu would not move from his spot. He also seemed to be standing oddly, shifting his weight from one leg to the other. 122.content:
The girl ran across the playground in tears. She only stopped when she turned behind the school and found herself alone. As tears continued to run down her face she sat down with her back against the wall.

“Is something the matter dear?”

The girl looked up, but saw nothing.

“Hello?”

“Right here deary.”

That’s when the girl saw it. A butterfly. The insect flew up to her and she could make out the patterns on its wings and the red face it had. Wait, do butterflies have faces? This one’s face looked human and had rosey cheeks.

“You can talk?”

“Of course deary. But enough about me. Let's talk about you.” The girl sniffled. "How about we start with your name?"

“Okay. I'm Lilly.”

"Hello Lily. Now, why were you crying?"

The girl hesitated a moment before answering. “The other kids keep making fun of me.”

“Really? Why would anyone do that?”

“It’s cuz-“ Lily looked around to make sure no one was nearby. “I hafta wear diapers.”

“Oh, so you’re a bedwetter?”

“No. I mean, yes, but I have accidents in the daytime too. I’m actually wearing a diaper right now. If I'm not wearing protection I could have an accident. That’s why I hafta wear diapers.”

“And the other kids don’t.”

“No, they don’t.”

“But you wish they did.” Lilly thought the butterfly’s high-pitched voice changed for a second there.

“Kinda. I mean, yeah, I do wish that I wasn’t the only kid who had to wear diapers.”

The butterfly smiled from ear to ear. “Wish granted.”

All of a sudden there was a bright flash of light.

***

It was morning in the Powerpuff Girl’s bedroom. Blossom opened her eyes, then sat up and yawned. Buttercup turned over and Blossom thought she heard a strange noise.

“Buttercup?”

“Still sleeping.”

There was that sound again.

“Buttercup do you hear that?”

“Urgh.” Buttercup sat up. “Hear what?”

“That sound. It’s like crinkling, or something.”

Buttercup stood up. “Do you mean this?” She pulled up her night gown to reveal a disposable diaper wrapped around her crotch. Poking it with her hand Buttercup was able to produce the crinkling sound.

“Oh, I guess that’s all it was.” Blossom felt the diaper under her own night gown. It was snug and thick and crinkly.

“Yeah, kids our age, wearing diapers? That sure is out of place,” Buttercup said, her voice full of sarcasm.

Next to them Bubbles yawned and sat up. “Morning.”

“Morning,” Blossom said to Bubbles. Then she turned back to Buttercup. “I don’t know, it’s just- I can’t help but feel off. Like- like there’s something strange going on.”

“‘Strange’ huh? I don’t know Bubbles, do you feel like there’s anything strange going on?”

“I don’t think so.” Bubbles stood up. “I don’t-“ Suddenly she stopped and leaned over, her hands on her knees. With barely any warning Bubbles began peeing into her own diaper. A warm feeling erupted from her nether regions and she was happy to wet herself. When she was finished she stood straight up and lifted up her night gown to get a good look at her diaper. Bubbles giggled. “I went pee-pee in my diapey.”

“No, seems like everything’s normal to me,” Buttercup said.

Usagi rolled over in her bed snoring loudly. Normally nothing could stop her from making noises like that all night. However when she rolled over she felt something cold and wet on her side. Groggily she opened her eyes. She was still half asleep and wasn't sure what to make of it all. Pulling back the covers she began to see what the problem was.

"Chibi-usa!" Usagi shouted.

Slowly the pink-haired girl stirred and returned to the land of waking. She sat up and while rubbing her eyes asked, "what's the matter Usagi?"

"That's what's the matter you little twerp!" Usagi pointed at a wet spot on her bed. Looking down Chibi-usa could see it continued all the way to her pajama's and ran to her crotch.

She looked down in shame and started to blush. "Don't tell me I wet the bed again?"

"Yes, 'again'. As in the third time this month!" Usagi's voice was now getting quite loud.

"Usagi! Keep it down!" Luna chided her. She leapt onto Usagi's dresser to see what the commotion was. Usagi was never up this early. "Now, what are you two fussing about this time?"

"That!" Usagi pointed to Chibi-usa's soaked pajama's.

"Oh dear. Did she have another accident?"

"It's not my fault," Chibi-usa moaned. "I'm just a little kid. You can't let Usagi yell at me just because I have an accident every now and again."

"What?!" Usagi shouted. "You little spore! Don't try to make me into the villain here!"

"Usagi! That's enough." Luna admonished. "Yelling at her isn't going to make this problem go away." This made Chibi-usa stick her tongue out at Usagi. "However, this is starting to become something of a concern."

"Yeah! I can't spend all day cleaning my sheets just because the pink spore here isn't potty trained yet!"

"Hey!" Chibi-usa called back.

"Enough bickering you two." Luna did her best to keep the argument from escalating. "Now, there's no point crying over spilt milk. First we have to clean up this mess, then we can think of a solution to our problem."

It was that evening when Usagi presented her solution to Chibi-usa.

"Diapers?" She couldn't believe this. "I'm not a baby Usagi!"

"Could have fooled me."

"Stop it, both of you!" Luna called out. "Usagi and I have talked about it and we've decided this was the best solution. As long as you're wearing some sort of protection we won't have to worry about you making a mess of the bed."

"MY bed you mean!" Usagi added.

"But, diapers?! Couldn't you have found something a little less babyish?"

"Yes Usagi," Luna turned to the blonde girl. "I was under the impression you were going to buy some sort of underwear designed for bed-wetting." She looked at the the package Usagi had in her hands. "These seem to be exactly the same kind of diaper you would put on a baby, just larger."

Usagi had on a devilish grin. "What can I say? This was the only thing I could find." Chibi-usa pouted and Luna shook her head. That was obviously a lie. "Well, it doesn't matter anyways. They've all we've got at the moment." Usagi opened the package and pulled out a diaper.

"So what's it going to be squirt? Can you put it on by yourself, or do I need to hold you down and diaper you like a little baby?"
