As the morning sun gleamed through the window, Chibi-usa woke up, and as usual, Usagi was fast asleep. She got out of bed, and felt around her diaper. "Good. It's dry." she said. However, after the experience of being in a diaper again, she couldn't help but think about wearing them. "After all, I'm still little enough to fit in them. I guess I better use this one while I'm in the bathroom. Of course, I need to get rid of the other diaper that's in the trashcan, so nobody in the house will know." she said.

She quickly grabbed a change of clothes and another diaper from Usagi's closet, and headed straight to the bathroom. She locked the door behind her. She looked in the trashcan and saw that the one she used last night was still there, but it was giving a bit of a bad smell. "Ugh. I need to get rid of this trash soon. My poopy diaper will give me away." Then, she felt the need to pee. She started to walk towards the toilet, but remembered that she still had a diaper on. She did a semi-squat, and sighed as she began to pee in the diaper. In a matter of seconds, she was finished, and took off the now-wet diaper. She put it in the trash along with the messy one. After taking a bath, She then put her dress and her new diaper. She then tied up the small garbage bag that was in the trash can, and walked out with it.

After checking around the house, realizing she is the only one up, she took the trash bag outside to the trash container outside. She put the bag inside the container, and headed back towards the house.
123111222.title: Chibi-usa the Diaper Girl

1231112221.content:
Chibi-usa went back into her and Usagi's room. She tried to find her backpack, but then she remembered. "It's the weekend. There's no school. I can go to the park, but what if I pee or poop in this diaper." She thought to herself. Then she remembered, she had a spare backpack. She went to grab it, and she grabbed several diapers to stuff into it. She also put her money purse in the front compartment of the backpack. She went downstairs to have something quick for breakfast: Some toast and orange juice. She drank several glasses of orange juice with her toast, and she left the house after she finished cleaning up.

She was on her way to the park, and all of the sudden, she had the feeling that she needed to pee. "I need to pee already. I guess that orange juice just went right through me. But, I think I can hold it until I can get to the park. I really don't want a wet diaper right now." She thought. It wasn't until she made it to the park when her urge to pee got stronger. "I need to find a way to hide the fact that I'm wearing a diaper." She then saw the bathrooms. "I can go in there." She rushed to the bathroom, but saw that it was closed for cleaning. "The bathroom had to be closed now. This is just great. I don't think I could hold it." She saw a side of the park that had no people around. She started walking in the empty direction until she was at a good spot. "No one is looking. Here I go." She let her bladder go, and her pee sprayed in her diaper. She sighed in pure happiness. "Ah. That's better." After a bit, she finished peeing, but now, she felt the weight of the diaper. "Wow. This diaper is quite heavy. But, I wonder if I should go find another bathroom to change in or keep it on."
1231112221.title: Wet at the Park

choices: Goes to the ice cream parlor.
12311122212.content:
Chibi-usa decided to keep it on for now. "This should be interesting. Although, my diaper is a bit heavy." She walked towards the swing set, and sat on one of the open swings. She felt her diaper squish on her bottom. "This feels kinda good." she said as she started to swing on the swing set. Soon, she was done swinging, and she went to sit on one of the park benches. She felt her diaper squish again. She sat there, but she then felt the need to pee again. "Not again." She thought. But, since she was sitting, she knew no one would notice. She grabbed the back of her skirt and pulled it away from the seat of her diaper. "It'll be bad if the diaper leaked on my skirt." She closed her eyes, smiled, and began to pee in her diaper again. As she was done, she felt quite uncomfortable in her diaper. "Ugh. This diaper isn't feeling so great anymore. I better go change it." She got off the bench and felt the diaper sag. She looked over and the bathrooms, and saw that they were finally opened.

As she was close to the bathrooms, she felt a pain in her bottom. "Oh no. Why do I have to poop now?" She then rushed in the bathroom and got into one of the stalls until she felt her poop escape from her bottom and into her diaper. "That's better." She said. But now, instead of a saggy wet diaper, she now had a saggy wet an messy diaper. She figured it was time for her to change. She wiped herself clean of her pee and poop, and taped the her used diaper into a ball. She then put a new diaper on, left the stall, and threw her used one away. She then left the bathroom. "I feel much better now." She said.
12311122212.title: Drenched and Worse

choices: Usagi wakes up the next morning with a wet diaper.
Usagi wakes up that night having to go number two.
12312.content:
"There is no way I'm going to wear that thing to bed!" Chibi-usa said defiantly.

The edges of Usagi's mouth curled up into a smile. "Fine. If that's the way you want to play it." Usagi lunged at the pink haired girl. The two struggled on the bed for a moment before Chibi-usa's pajama bottoms were pulled off.

"Give those back!" Chibi-usa sat up reaching for her pants. Usagi pushed the younger girl over and held her down.

"Look squirt, you're going to wear diapers to bed even if I have to put them on in your sleep!"

After continuing to struggle for a while Chibi-usa began to realize how pointless it was to fight back. She stopped struggling and her body went still.

"Finally," Usagi breathed. Not wasting a moment she took the diaper and unfolded it. "Now I need you to lift up your butt." Biting her lip Chibi-usa complied and Usagi slid the diaper underneath her. Once her bottom was back down on the padding Usagi pulled up the front of the diaper and began fastening it shut. Before long Chibi-usa was sealed inside her new diaper.

"Usagi, that was a terrible thing to do." Luna scolded.

"Yeah, whatever. So long as it keeps the little spore from peeing all over my bed I figure I'm doing us both a favour." Meanwhile Chibi-usa had sat up and began poking at the front of her diaper. She was surprised how thick it was. Much more so than her underwear.

Still upset at everything that happened Chibi-usa didn't say another word as the two girls crawled into bed. Usagi was snoring right away but Chibi-usa was still too upset to fall asleep. As she stewed there she remembered Usagi threatening to diaper her in her sleep. That gave her an idea.

Getting out of bed Chibi-usa summoned forth Luna P, the floating ball that bore more than a passing resemblance to Usagi's cat. Being careful not to wake either Usagi or Luna, Chibi-usa gave the command "Luna P Henge!" A moment later Luna P was in the shape of a rattle. Pulling back the covers Chibi-usa pointed the rattle at the sleeping Usagi. A ray of light shot out and struck the blonde girl. Eager to inspect her work Chibi-usa climbed back on to the bed and pulled back the waistband to Usagi's pajamas. Underneath she could see a thick diaper wrapped around her crotch.

Satisfied with her handiwork, Chibi-usa crawled back into bed.
12312.title: Forced into diapers

123122.content: Usagi woke up in the middle of the night with an upset stomach. She stood up, unaware of the waddle in her step. She walked into the bathroom, lifted up the toilet lid, pulled down her pajama pants, and sat down on the toilet. She started to grunt and unknowingly unloaded into her diaper. She pulled her pajama pants up, flushed the toilet and closed the lid. She waddled back to bed and laid down pulling up the covers.
123122.title: Sleep pooping

choices: Usagi gets mad at Chibi-usa for putting her in a diaper.
Chibi-usa teases Usagi for messing herself.
1231221.content:
Usagi tossed and turned in the bed. Even though she was half-asleep already she was unable to fall back asleep again. There was something that was bothering her, but she wasn’t sure what. Finally she sniffed the air and a rancid stench greeted her nose. Usagi immediately sat up in bed. Looking around she tried to determine the source of the smell. She didn’t know where it was coming from but she did come to one conclusion.

“It smells like someone pooped!” She said aloud. Immediately she looked down at Chibi-usa. The pink spore had wet the bed many times but pooping herself was something new. Pulling back the covers Usage looked at Chibi-usa’s sleeping form. In one swift motion Usagi pulled down the girl’s pajama pants and exposed her diaper. Strange, the diaper didn’t look used. As Usage felt the front of the diaper to check if it was wet Chibi-usa slowly began to wake up.

Oddly it looked like Chibi-usa’s diaper remained clean. But then where was that smell coming from? A bad idea found its way into Usage’s head. For whatever reason her pajama bottoms felt, heavy somehow. Reaching behind her Usage felt a large lump in the seat of her pants. No, it couldn’t be.
1231221.title: What's that smell?

choices: The others continue to tease Pallapalla.
1232.content:
"Wet again." Pallapalla muttered to herself. It was morning and she had just woke up to see her bed was soaked with pee. "I can't let the others find out about this."

"Hey Pallapalla!" Junjun stuck her green-haired head into Pallapalla's room. "Quit sleeping in dummy! We've got stuff to do today!"

Pallapalla almost jumped out of her skin. This was exactly what she didn't need.

"What's the matter with you?" Junjun stepped inside. "Wait a minute. Does somebody have a secret their trying to hide?"

"No!" Pallapalla said.

"Maybe you were writing in your diary. Or maybe..." Junjun jumped onto the bed and leaned over Pallapalla. "Maybe your trying to- Wait why is the bed all squishy?"

Pallapalla's face went beat red as a grin spread across Junjun's face. Seconds later the blue haired girl was chasing Junjun down the halls. "I'm gonna tell! I'm gonna tell!" Junjun sang.

Soon enough the two ran into the room where the other two members of the amazon quartet were. Would you two keep it down?" the red headed Vesves said.

"You guys gotta hear about this though!"

"She's lying!" Pallapalla cried.

"But she hasn't even said anything yet," Cerecere pointed out as she combed her pink hair.

"Yeah, well she's still being mean!"

"Honestly, what are you two going on about?"

Junjun was practically beaming as she shouted, "Pallaplalla wet the bed!"

"No I didn't!"

"Then why are your pants soaking wet?" Vesves said pointing to the wet spot on Pallapalla's pants. All she could do to respond was blush.

All at once the other three began teasing her.

"Pallapalla is a pee-pee pants!"

"She peed all over her bed just like a little baby!"

"Heh. If she's such a big baby then maybe we oughta put her in diapers just to be safe!"
1232.title: Dead Moon Circus

choices: Zirconia arrives to send the girls out on a mission.
Pallapalla continues to exact her revenge.
12321.content:
Unable to cope with the teasing any longer Pallapalla turned and ran out of the room. She had never been so upset in her life! Someone should teach those stupid girls a lesson!

That was when she came up with her idea. She stood perfectly still and focused on her shadow. Then she called out, "Ba-ba, come out and play!"

Out of her shadow a figure appeared. It immediatly took the form a woman with light blue skin. She had a disposable diaper wrapped around her waist, a large bib that covered her chest and a small baby's bonnet on her head. She held a giant-sized rattle in her hand and was sucking on a pacifier.

"What can I do for you Pallapalla?"

"I had an accident this morning and the other girls started teasing me about it. They said I was a big baby! I want you to go out there and show them what it really feels like to be babies!"

Smiling, the minion quickly departed.

Back outside the other members of the amazon quartet were just cooling down from their riotous laughter.

"Can you believe what a baby she is?" Junjun asked.

"Yeah." Vesves agreed. "As if wetting the bed wasn't bad enough she still ran off and cried like a baby!"

"I think somebody needs to be put back in diapers."

"Yeah. We should totally find some and make Pallapalla-" Junjun stopped. "Wait a second. Who said that?"

"I did." Ba-ba appeared behind the green-haired girl. "And I wasn't talking about Pallapalla."

Before anyone could react Ba-ba pointed her large rattle at Junjun and a stream of light shot out of it striking her in the chest. She was engulfed in flash of light. A second later the light was gone. However Junjun's clothes had now changed. Instead of her usual green outfit she was now dressed in a large disposable diaper and a green shirt that read 'big baby.'

Vesves and Cerecere immediatly began laughing at the girl. "I'm glad you girls find this amusing, because you're next!" Whipping her giant rattle around she fired off shots at the other two girls striking them both dead on. Vesves held up her hands to block the attack. It seemed to help a little bit because when the light died down she was still wearing her bra. Though she also had a disposable diaper clinging to her bottom. Cerecere was lookng herself over as well, noting that underneath the frilly dress she had on that she was also diapered.

"Wh- why did you do this to us!?" Vesves demanded.

"Beacause I told her to." Pallapalla stepped into the room. "And I think it's time you three started dressing your age."

"Why you little!" Junjun lept towards Pallapalla but immediatly stopped. Her eyes fell down to the diaper she was wearing. Everyone else in the room followed her gaze and watched as a yellow spot appeared on the front of her diaper. "I, I didn't- I mean I don't-" The yellow spot grew and grew. It took up almost the entire front of the diaper when it finally stopped.

"Who needs diapers now?" Pallapalla jeered.
12321.title: Payback

choices: The lady gives them a present.
Th old lady invites the kittens into her house.
124.content:
"I'm only going to say this one more time. Give me what's in your bag or you will regret it."

For whatever reason Jackalman had decided now would be a good time to start mugging passer-by. The two young Thundercats smirked. They'd make him think twice before doing that again.

From her perch in a nearby tree Wilykit could just make out the figure Jackalman was threatening. It appeared to be an old Wollo woman. She turned to her twin brother who was sitting right next to her. They exchanged nods and leapt into the fray.

"Hey Jackalman!" The mutant had just enough time to look up and see the pair of Thunderkittens as they struck him. He staggered backwards and fell to the ground. Once he was off his feet Wilykat started mocking him. "Mugging a poor old woman? You've really hit rock bottom this time."

"You miserable little brats! This is no concern of yours!"

"Yeah? Well it is now!" Wilykit pulled out a capsule and threw it at Jackelman's feet where it exploded into a cloud of yellow gas.

"Is that supposed scare me you little- *Acho!* Little br*Acho!*"

Wilykat couldn't help himself. "I hope you learned your lesson Jackalman. Remember, crime is nothing to sneeze at!"

"Wilykat, that was terrible!"

By now Jackalman had crawled to his feet and had started to back away. "I won't *Achoo!* forget this *Ahcoo!* Thunder- *Achoo!* brats!" By the time he finished his taunt he was almost out of earshot.

With Jackalman dealt with the twins turned to his would be target. She was an old Wollo with dark grey fur covering her from head to toe.

"Are you alright ma'am?"

"Oh don't worry about little old me. That highway robber was all bark and no bite."

"You can say that again." Wilykat said. His eyes glanced down to the bag. "Where exactly were you going with that?"

"I was just going back to my house after doing some shopping. That rude little man seemed to think I was carrying gold or something."

"Well if that's all we can give you a lift there on our spaceboards." Wilykit suggested.

"Oh no. I wouldn't want to be any trouble."

"No trouble at all ma'am." Less than half an hour later the three had arrived at a rustic log cabin.

"I'd like to show my appreciation for you two helping me out back there."

"No thanks necessary ma'am."

"Oh please, I insist."
124.title: A helping hand

choices: The two decide to play on their spaceboards.
1241.content:
The old Wollo entered into her house and returned a few minutes later. In her hands she was carrying a squarish plastic package. "I hope you children don't mind a little candy," she said handing it over to the twins.

The two grinned at each other. "Oh we don't mind at all."

After their goodbyes were said the kittens ran off looking for a secluded place to indulge in their spoils. However they soon noticed something odd about their prize.

"This doesn't look like a box of candy," Wilykit noticed. She used her claw to cut into the packaging and open it up. She reached inside and rummaged around. Soon she pulled her hand out taking with it something unusual.

"What exactly is that?" her brother asked. Whatever it was it was white and seemed to be folded in half. She opened it up and noticed some lining that ran around the inside edges. There were also some sort of tapes at the ends. "Let me see that package," the boy grabbed the plastic container and began inspecting it.

"What does it say?"

"Well this definitely isn't candy. Hang on. It says 'Adult Diapers.'"

"That old lady must have gotten confused and given us these by mistake."

"Well, they say the mind's the first thing to go."

"Wilykat!"

"Sorry."

Wilykit slid over to sit closer to her brother. "So what is a 'diaper' anyway?"

"I think you're supposed to wear it." He kept reading. "What does 'incontinent' mean?"

"It means that you don't have any control when you go to the bathroom." Wilykit turned over the diaper in her hands. "I wonder what that must feel like."

"You want to find out?"

"Sure, why not?"

There is nothing on the face of Third Earth more curious than a young Thundercat. When they seek to try something there is little one can do to persuade them otherwise.

"Okay, so what do I do first?" Wilykit asked.

"First you have to take off your clothes. These things go on right next to your skin."

A moment later Wilykit had taken off all her clothing and stood naked in front of her brother. This was not treated as unusual by either of them. After all, there were no nudity taboos on Thundera.

"Okay, next you have to lay down."

"On the ground? With all the dirt?"

Wilykat thought about that. "Maybe we can use our spaceboards."

Soon enough Wilykit was lying on top of her spaceboard, her twin brother diapering her.

"There. All done."

Wilykit stood up and examined her diaper. She put her finger inside the waistband and pulled back feeling the springyness of the material. Then she ran her hands along the inside of her legs checking to see how it fit down there.

"So? How does it feel?"

Wilykit thought for a moment. "It feels kind of weird. But it's really soft and comfortable."

By now Wilykat had removed his clothes and was sitting on his spaceboard. "Okay. Now it's my turn."

"Hold your horses." Wilykit said as she grabbed another diaper. Within a minute Wilykit was finishing securing the tapes and sealing her brother inside a diaper of his own.
1241.title: An unusual gift

choices: WIlykit wants to pee in her diaper.
Wilykat decides to go number two.
12411.content:
Putting their little detour behind them the two thunderkittens put their tunics back on and resumed playing on their spaceboards, pulling off tricks and racing each other. It was about an hour later when Wilycat's board slowed down to a crawl. Wilykit flew over to her brother to see what was going on.

"What's the matter?"

"It's nothing really, I just... have to use the bathroom."

Wilykit scoffed. "So? What's the problem?"

"I was just thinking..." Wilykat pulled up his tunic to expose the diaper he was wearing. "These things are made so you can use them instead of going to the bathroom. Right?"

Wilykit had almost forgotten they were wearing diapers. She put her hand on her diaper and squeezed the thick padding to remind herself. "Yeah I guess so. Kinda wonder what it feels like though."

"Well, only one way to find out." The pair jumped down from their spaceboards. Wilykat began trying to relieve himself but found he couldn't do it.

"Well? Are you going yet?"

"No."

"Well what are you waiting for?"

"I'm not waiting for anything. I keep trying to pee but I can't."

"Huh." Wilykit thought to herself. "Your body is probably so used to peeing on a toilet that it doesn't know how to do it in a diaper." Then an idea hit her. "Oh, I know! Sit down on your board and pretend you're sitting on the toilet."

Wilykat did as his sister instructed. He squeezed and squeezed but couldn't make anything come out. "It's no good Wilykit."

WIlykit hopped on the spaceboard next to her brother. "Maybe you're just too tense. You should try to relax more."

"Yeah? How?"

Wilykit leaned over and began rubbing Wilykat's shoulders. "Don't think about using your diaper. Just take some deep breaths and let it happen."

WIlykat did as he was told. He stopped thinking about the soft padding that he was sitting in, about how he had to pee and just enjoyed as his sister continued to rub his shoulders.

Then Wilkat felt a strange sensation down in his nether regions. The pressure in his bladder disappeared and he felt a wonderful feeling of warmth spreading out from the front of his diaper. "Wilykit, I'm doing it!"

"Really?" Immediately Wilykit placed her hand on the front of her brother's diaper. She could feel the diaper grow both warm and moist underneath her touch. "What does it feel like?"

"It's wonderful. It's warm and squishy." He said as he kept pushing more urine out. He didn't want the feeling to stop. While he was doing that he put his hand on diaper next to Wilykit's so he could feel himself wetting from the outside as well.
12411.title: Spaceboards and diapers

124111.content:
It wasn't long before Wilykat had finished relieving himself. He was almost disappointed when he stopped filling the diaper with urine.

"That was actually pretty nice," he purred.

Wilykit quickly made up her mind. "Okay, I guess I may as well try it too." She closed her eyes.

Wilykat placed his hand on the front of his crotch and squeezed. He could hear the diaper make a squoosh noise and found that he enjoyed holding the garment against his private parts. Casually he looked over at his sister. "Well?"

Wilykit opened her eyes and sighed. "I don't actually have to go."

Wilykat smiled and took out his canteen. "Maybe you just need some encouragement," he said as he began drinking out of it.

"RIght. I get the picture." Soon Wilykit was gulping down large quantities of water from her own canteen. It wasn't long before both canteens were empty.

Wilykat started playing with the tapes on his diaper while he waited for his bladder to refill. Next to him Wilkit kept pulling at the elastic that kept her diaper in place. It wasn't long before nature started calling.

Wilykat lay down on his spaceboard and let loose another torrent of pee. This time the feelings of warmth and witness were even more intense. Wilkit watched as her brother wet himself a second time and noticed the diaper had started to leak some. A small pool of urine spilled onto the spaceboard and got the bottom of Wilykat's tunic wet.

"Wilykat, your tunic's all wet," Wilykit pointed out.

"Huh?" Wilykat sat up and inspected himself. "Huh, I guess it is."

"Don't you care?"

"Honestly? I was so busy peeing I didn't notice." He looked at his sister. "What about you? Aren't you going to try out your diaper?"

Wilykit hesitated. Her bladder was telling her that she had to go but... "I'm starting to have second thoughts about this."

"Aw come on sis. This is exactly what these were made for."
124111.title: Diapers for Urine-joyment

12412.content:
Wilykit and Wilykat began pulling on their tunics. “Wow, are these things ever thick,” Wilykit commented.

“It’s like I’ve got a pillow down my pants,” Wilykat chuckled. He walked up to his spaceboard. “Look. They’re so thick you have to waddle.”

Wilykit took a few steps and found the same thing. Then she got an idea. “Hey, instead of riding our spaceboards, let’s try walking with these things, just to see what it feels like.”

“Okay,” her brother agreed and the pair began walking back the way they came.

It was a few minutes later when Wilykit abruptly turned around.

“What’s the matter sis?”

“I thought I heard something.”

“You mean something like me!?” a voice called out. An instant later Jakalman jumped out of the bushes.

“What the matter Jakalman? Haven’t had enough for one day? Because if you want to go for round two we can oblige.” Wilykat took a step forward, then he realized he was still wearing the diaper.

“Sure. I’ll go again. But this time we’re playing by different rules.” Jakalman reached behind his back and pulled out a vaguely gun-shaped device. “This is Vultureman’s new Vertigo inducer. See how you like it.” Jakalman pointed the device at the Thunderkittens.

In an instant both Willykit and Wilykat dropped to their knees. The world around them seemed to spin, making them so dizzy they couldn’t even stand up.

“Kit, I don’t feel so good,” Wilykat called out to his sister. Wilykit however had a bigger problem. All of a sudden her stomach was upset and she felt the need to use the bathroom. Before she could do anything about it she felt a warm mush exit her bottom and settle into the seat of her diaper.

After about a minute Jakalman turned off the device. “Had enough?” Neither one of the siblings offered a response. They were still too dizzy. “Well, I have to hand it to Vultureman, this thing works great.” He put the device away and pulled out two lengths of rope. With the two kittens too sick to fight back they offered no resistance as he tied one end of each rope around each cat’s wrists, binding them together. Then he took the other ends of the ropes in his hands and began leading them down the path. “You two are my prisoners now. I’m sure we can find some use for you when we get back to Castle Castle Plun-Darr.”
12412.title: Jackalman's Revenge

choices: Clover and Alex break into the day-care.
Dr. Young makes good on his threat.
1251.content:
Sam kept twiddling her fingers. It had been close to five minutes and there was still no sign of anyone coming to greet her. She glanced at her watch again. No, she was right on time.

Finally the door opened and a young woman walked out. She had black hair that went down to her shoulders. "Samantha? I believe you had a job interview?"

Sam stood up. "Yes. I was hoping to work part time at your day care facilities."

The woman smiled. "Yes of course. Please come this way." The woman led Sam through the door she had entered.

They started off in silence but soon Sam began whispering. "Something about this place feels off. I just can't put my finger on what exactly."

"Did you say something?" The woman turned and asked.

Sam waved her hands dismissively. "Me? Oh, I was just er... admiring the architecture."

The woman stared at her for a moment. Sam looked into her eyes but all she could see was an unusual emptiness in them. The woman then turned back around and continued leading Sam. What she didn't know was that Sam had a two way radio in her ear and was talking to her two partners on the outside.

"I guess Jerry was right about that day care place being up to something," Alex said.

"Like, no duh!" Clover continued dangling her legs over the side of the building. From their position they could clearly see the day care office across the street. "You'd think someone would notice they keep looking for employees but don't actually offer any day-caring." She pulled her legs onto the roof and lay down. "Ugh! Just once I wish someone besides W.O.O.H.P. would step in and take care of this kind of thing so I could spend some more time at the mall."

Back inside the day-care Samantha and her guide had entered an elevator. Her radio went out, but she didn't pay it any mind. Elevators were notorious for interfering with that sort of thing. What did bother her was that she could feel the elevator going down instead of up.

"Is there a reason you're holding the job interview in the basement?" Sam asked. Something was definitely wrong. The day-care employee wouldn't even look at her. "Hey! Did you hear me? I said-" Sam put her hand on the woman's shoulder to get her attention. The second she did so the woman spun around at her waist and her arms shot out. They began to wrap around Sam like a pair of tentacles making it so she couldn't move. "A robot! Just what I don't need!" she muttered to herself.

Soon enough the door opened and Sam was hauled out into another room. This one was featureless except for a large set of windows on one side that had some sort of metal shutters covering them. Sam struggled against the robot but it was useless.

"Another guest I see?"

Sam looked up to see another woman, or robot, she guessed, standing in front of her. This one had red hair and in her arms she held what looked like a small baby dressed in a blue onesie. To Sam's surprise it was the baby who spoke up. "Welcome to my day-care center. I do hope you enjoy your stay."

Sam was dumbfounded. "You mean you're the one behind the abductions? But you're just a baby!"

"So, you know about the abductions eh?" He smiled a toothless grin.

Sam face faulted. Way to blow your cover girl. Oh well. May as well try to get some info out of him. "Yes. I know about your kidnapping scheme. What I can't imagine is what a little baby like you gets out of it."

This caused the baby to frown. "I am not a baby young lady. My name is doctor Young. The most brilliant mind the world has ever seen."

"Heard that one before," Sam muttered.

Ignoring her the '"doctor" continued on. "After years of research I came upon a miraculous discovery. A way to reverse the aging process. Unfortunately, I couldn't find any willing human test subjects, so I tested it on myself. You can see the results for yourself."

"Let me guess; now you want to rule the world for some reason, right?"

"It's not about a matter of want. You see, since my transformation I no longer age! I have effectively become immortal. I am one of a kind, better suited for leading humanity than anyone else!"

Sam sighed. "Why couldn't this have been an actual day-care. Just once?"

"Oh, but we do run a day-care here, as you are about to see."

The shutters covering the windows slid upwards and Sam looked out the glass. She could see that they were in an elevated room overlooking another much bigger one below them. The large are was littered with children's toys such as blocks, and stuffed toys. The walls and floor were padded and giant sized versions of some stuffed animals sat about.

All that was far less unsettling than the occupants of said room. Sam could see teenage boys and girls scattered about and they were all dressed like babies. Some were wearing only diapers and t-shirts while others wore overalls. Worse, by looking at them Sam could see they were all acting like babies as well!

"You little creep! What did you do, brainwash them? Why?"

Dr. Young giggled. "To turn them into an army."

"They don't look particularly fierce to me."

"Well, they're not ready yet. At present my device can only wipe out a person's metal faculties. It cannot replace an existing personality with a new one that is better suited to following my orders. Until I perfect that aspect of my device I can still collect prospective soldiers and keep them here. I really don't have a problem with letting these fools crawl around-" He stopped. "Oh dear."

Sam watched on as Dr. Young curled his lower lip and began straining. At first Sam wasn't sure what was happening. Then the smell hit her.

"Do you know what it's like being trapped in diapers all the time? Never being able to tell when you're about to make a mess? Having to call someone over to change you? Well, don’t worry. You're about to."
1251.title: Totally Diapered!

12511.content:
The silence of the hallway was shattered as the air vent covering fell to the floor. With practiced skill Clover and Alex slid out and darted down the corridor.

"Wow, Sam was right. This place is creepy." Clover said aloud.

"It's probably not as bad with the lights on." Alex responded. It wasn't long before the pair came to the elevator. "You think Sam came this way?"

"Well if I were an evil criminal mastermind or whatever, I know I'd do all my evil plotting in the basement."

"Hm. Good point." The pair entered the elevator and started their decent.

"How long has Sammy been out of radio contact?" Clover asked.

"Close to half an hour now."

"Yeah, that's way too long for her to go without calling. Sam's definitely in trouble."

The elevator door opened and the sneaking continued. It wasn't long before Alex held up her hand and whispered "I hear someone coming."

Immediately the pair dove into the closest room and peeked through a crack at the door to see what was happening. A blonde haired woman walked down the length of the hall. Alex and Clover didn't breath until she was well out of sight.

"That was close," Clover sat back from the door.

Alex was busy investigating the room they were currently inside. "Clover, take a look at this stuff."

Clover did. What she saw were a pair of changing tables in the center of the room with mobiles above them. "It's just a bunch of baby junk Alex," She said dismissively.

"You know any babies that wear diapers this big?" Alex picked up one of the diapers. Indeed it was large enough to have fit either one of them.

"Okay that's just gross."

"There's more. Pacifiers, rattles, bottles. All of this stuff is way too big for a baby."

"Whatever's going on in this place it gives me the heeby-jeebies. Let's find Sam and get out of here." Clover casually stepped back through the door into the hallway. She immediately regretted her decision when she saw a figure approaching her. "Crap!" She hopped back inside and closed the door. "I think they saw me. Hide, quick!"

A moment later the door opened and a figure walked inside. Alex had hidden herself away in one of the rom's cupboards while Clover had used her suckstion cup knee and elbow pads to stickto the ceiling. They quickly recognized the figure as the blonde-haired woman from earlier. She was carrying a boy, about their age, but wearing a t-shirt and diaper.

The woman placed the boy on one of the tables and began removing his diaper. With the boy on his back he was looking straight up at the ceiling. And at Clover.

Clover put her finger to her lips but the boy reached upwards with his arms, waving them indiscriminately and babbling. Clover kept gesturing for the boy to be quit lest she be discovered. Unfortunately all her movement caused her wall clinging ability to fail and she fell to the floor. She looked up to see the Blonde woman looking down at her.

Immediately Clover jumped to her feet and kicked at the woman. The attack bounced harmlessly off. In response both the woman's arms shot out and pinned Clover against the far wall. "Naughty girl." She said.

"Robots. It's always robots," Clover muttered to herself. A second later she found herself pulled back across the room and laid on the robot's lap.

"Naughty girls need to be punished." Then the robot began paddling Clovers' bottom.
12511.title: Infiltration

choices: Alex finds and confronts Dr. Young.
125111.content:
Alex's first instinct was to leap out and help her friend. As she moved to do so however she knocked something over in the confines of the cupboard. That something just happened to be a container of baby powder which emptied some of its contents on the floor. In the enclosed space it didn't take long for the smell to make its way to Alex's nose. As soon as she inhaled the powder she began to feel very light headed. Leaning up against the cupboard wall she suddenly felt very relaxed. The softest moan escaped her lips, though fortunately for her, she could not be heard through the cupboard door.

Outside however, Clover was getting the spanking of her life. It didn't take long for the blonde to start tearing up from the pain and humiliation. She absolutely refused to let herself begin wailing however. Just when she felt as thought she may have to break the promise she made to herself, the spanking stopped. Before she knew what was happening Clover was picked up by the robot and set down on her back on the room's other changing table.

"Silly baby," the robot said. "These clothes aren't meant for you." Then her arms shot out and began to undo Clover's spy suit. Not about to let this go any further she grabbed the robot by the arms, and immediately received a strong shock. "Serves you right," the robot chastised again. "If I don't get you back into a diaper soon who knows what kind of a mess you'll make?"

As soon as the word 'diaper' was said Clover's blood ran cold. Was this stupid robot really going to put a diaper on her? Looking to her side Clover could see the teenage boy laying on the other table, naked from the waist down and completely oblivious to what was happening to her. The robot began undoing Clover's spy suit again, only this time the teen didn't have the energy to fight back. In a matter of seconds Clover's underwear was removed as well, leaving her completely naked. She tried to struggle but every time she moved the robot held her down.

The robot took a canister of baby powder from atop the cupboard and began sprinkling it on Clover's private parts. Clover was fuming at everything that had been done to her, but as the powder was spread she felt her anger slip away. She didn't even bother to try and fight back as the diaper was slid underneath her then drawn over her front and sealed.

It was about five minutes later when Alex was finally regaining her senses. As soon as she realized she was stuck in a cupboard filled with baby powder she pushed against the cupboard door and rolled out. Glad to have fresh air fill her lungs Alex realized she was alone. That robot lady was gone. Thankfully. Then Alex remembered that same robot paddling Clover's rear. First they lost contact with Sam, now Clover was gone, Alex knew she had to find the others quickly, before something horrible happened to them!

Clover herself was beginning to regain her senses. She was sitting on the floor in an unknown area. Immediately she stood up, and felt something heavy wrapped around her waist. Looking down she saw that she was in a short dress, one coloured a light purple. Clover then had flashbacks of the robot lady doing something to her. Daring to look at what was underneath her dress Clover took a quick peek, then pulled down the dress to cover herself.

Swallowing, Clover lifted up he dress again to look at her new undergarments. She felt her stomach drop. She was wearing a diaper! A very large, very thick diaper that was constantly pressing up against her skin.

"This isn't happening, this isn't happening," the girl muttered to herself. She reached down with her hand and ran her fingers across the slick plastic. She let out a moan.

That was when Clover realized she was being observed. She turned around and saw a boy. A drop dead gorgeous boy sitting on the floor. And he was looking straight at Clover. A quick glance around the room she was in told her that everyone else present was roughly her age, and dressed more or less as she was. There was also another woman dressed identically to the robot that had grabbed her, who seemed to be observing everyone. Then Clover realized she was the only one standing up. Quickly she dropped to the ground to better blend in and shuffled over to the hottie- uh, boy, to get some answers.

"Pst- Hey, you!" She tried to keep her vice down. "What is this place?" Then she wondered if Sam might be in here as well. "And have you seen a red haired brainiac anywhere around here?" The boy smiled and Clover found she couldn't help herself. "Oh and one more thing. You wouldn't happened to have a girlfriend would you?"

Clover watched the boy waiting for a response to her questions. Instead of answering however the boy sort of just, grit his teeth and began grunting slightly. Clover was confused at first, then she looked down and saw the boy's diaper become yellow in the front, at the same time it was bulging out in the back.

Clover quickly backed away. That handsome hunk had just pooped himself like- Clover gulped. Like a little baby. Frantically Clover looked around the room again and saw that everyone present was the same. Playing with baby toys, crawling around happily, giggling away without a care in the world. Clover looked down at her own diaper once again, wondering how long until she had to use it.
125111.title: Clover gets diapered

choices: Clover gets force fed a bottle.
1251111.content:
Hoping to find her friend Clover began searching about the oversized nursery. Fortunately for Clover Sam's red hair made her easy to pick out of a crowd. As she moved towards her friend Clover pulled down the front of her skirt in a vain attempt to cover her diaper.

When Clover came across her fellow spy Sam was busy playing with some blocks with letters on them, dressed in nothing but a t-shirt and a diaper. Clover toddled up to her friend and sat down. "Sam!" she whispered. Sam looked up from her work and looked Clover in the eye. "Boy am I glad to see you. We've got to get out of here!" Sam responded with a big wet smile. "Oh no. Sammy don't tell me they've been messing with your brain too!" Sam continued to move about her toy blocks.

Clover stood up and looked around. There were a few of those robo-maids standing about but none of them seems to be watching her at the moment. "Come on Sam, we've got to get out of here." Clover crouched down and pulled Sam to her feet. Then with her hands on Sam's shoulder the blonde began leading her friend towards the edge of the nursery.

The pair hadn't gone far before one of the robo-maids took notice of them and came over. Clover pushed Sam into her knees and promptly sat down next to her. Clover looked around in a panic wanting to blend in. Just before the robot approached she stuck her thumb in her mouth.

Now the robo-maid was standing over them. Her eyes went back and forth between the two. Clover was worried she'd be found out. Sam on the other hand was content to play with her toes. Eventually the robo-maid knelt down and put her finger inside the waistband of Clover's diaper. At that moment a mix of fear and embarrassment overwhelmed Clover.

"Well it looks like your diaper's still dry." The robot left Clover alone and moved over to Sam where she repeated the process. Apparently finding her dry as well the robo-maid stood up and walked away.
1251111.title: Two big babies

choices: Sam's knowledge starts to drain out of her.
Something is wrong with the machine.
12512.content:
Sam was carried down the hall, still wrapped up in the arms of the black-haired robot. The red-haired bot that held Dr. Young in its arms followed behind her. The group eventually came to a door, opened it and entered.

Sam could feel a lump in her throat as she looked around. She could see six large padded tables sitting inside. On their side she could see shelves filled with things like diapers, baby wipes and the like. It didn't take her long to realize what they were for.

"I know this is going to be the first diaper change you've had in a while, but you have nothing to worry about. I'll be right next to you the entire time." Dr. Young held out his hand and gestured towards a large pacifier sitting on a counter along the wall. The red-haired robot carrying him walked over and handed it to him. "Can't forget your paci now can we? Don't want our new baby making a fuss while get a diaper on her."

Sam struggled to get out of the robot's grip, now more desperate than ever. "I know it probably sounds cliche for me to say 'you'll never get away with this!' but I have a pretty good track record when it comes to stopping crazy -gah!" All at once she flet a jolt dash through her body. Instanly she felt her whole body go limp. It took all her effort just to lift her head up but before she could speak Dr. Young had shoved the pacifier into her mouth.

The Spy's body now felt incredibly heavy and Sam wasn't happy to have the thing inside her mouth. She tried to spit it out but she couldn't muster up the energy! She was feeling quite helpless by this point, then she sucked on the pacifier experimentaly. Strange as it was, sucking on it made her feel better, so she continued to do so.

The robot set Sam down on top one of the changing tables and unwrapped her arms. Sam tried to fight back but her body wouldn't move. With her arms free again, the robot retracted them until they resembled normal, human arms again.

Sam wanted to scream, or fight back, or do anything really. But try as she might she still couldn't do anything. The robot then began removing her clothes, and all Sam could do was suck on that stupid pacifier. Her head rolled to one side and she could see Dr. Young lying on the table next to her with the other robot unsnapping his onsie to get at his diaper.

In seconds both parties were ready to be diapered. Sam was naked and Dr. Young's messy diaper had been removed and his bottom cleaned. In perfect synchronization both robots sprinkled baby powder on their charges. Then their bottoms were lifted off the ground and a diaper slid underneath. Whimpering, Sam watched as the diaper was lifted over her crotch and taped closed.

"Don't worry dear. The first time's always the worst. Soon enough you'll be a professional when it comes to having your diaper changed."

Still sucking on her pacifier, a t-shirt was placed onto Sam and her arms were threaded through the sleeves. Then she was lifted up and carried by the black-haired robot out of the room, the other bot carrying Dr. Young behind her. Their next stop was another room, this one empty except for a chair in the middle and a large screen along one wall.

"And this is where all the magic happens." Dr. Young giggled as Sam was set down in the chair. She hadn't noticed it before but the chair had leather straps on it to hold down the occupant. The robot quickly had her strapped in tightly. Her arms legs, torso, even her head was restrained.

Finally, the pacifier was removed from her mouth. The red-haired robot stood in front of Sam so the doctor could see her clearly. Behind him Sam could see the screen come to life. "In a few minutes your brain will be regressed to that of a babbling infant." The black-haired robot approached the doctor and placed what looked like a pair of sunglasses on him. "I hope you don't mind if I watch."

"You're a sick and twisted little brat!" Sam called out. She felt that somehow wasn't quite enough. "And you fill your diapers with lots of stinky poo!"

Doctor Young leaned over and replied, "I'm not the only one."

With that the doctor was carried out of Sam's field of vision. Then her eyes moved to see the screen. She tried to stop herself but once again she found her body would not co-operate.

Helpless to do anything Sam could only look on as the screen filled with bright strobing lights and those swirly things that look like a tunnels when you spin them really fast. Then there were bunnies and kitties and duckies. Oh! There was a rattle! And a teddy...
12512.title: Diapers and brainwashing

choices: Sam makes a new friend in the nursery.
125121.content:
Sam tried to keep her mind focused but she found it very difficult to do so. She was forced to look ahead into the sea of images that flashed before her. SHe tried to close her eyes or loo away but she couldn't.

To try and take her mind off the problem she began reciting her times tables.
One times one is one.
Two times two is'

Sam panicked. She couldn't even remember basic math!

As the process went on she became aware of a need to pee. She held it in though. Just because that freak had put her in a diaper didn't mean he could make her use it.

Still staring forward she felt her body relax. Before she knew what was happening Sam felt a warm sensation fill her loins. She was peeing herself! At first Sam felt mortified, but the feeling quickly passed. Just a second ago she had been upset because she had wet herself but now she couldn't think of a reason why that was such a bad thing.

Dr. Young watched from the arms of his robot nanny as the girl's mind turned to mush in front of him. Within a few minutes the process was complete. The nurse pulled off his sun glasses and moved him close to the red haired girl. She stared back at him vacantly.

"One more big baby for the nursery." He looked down and saw the girl had wet her diaper. "I supposed we should get your diaper changed."
125121.title: Brain-drain

choices: Clover and Alex take Sam home.
The girls go after Dr. Young.
1251211.content:
"Hey sleepy head. It's time to get up."

Sam ignored the voice and continued to sleep away. It wasn't until a hand reached and began to gently shake her that she woke up.

Sam pulled herself into a sitting position. She couldn't remember ever feeling so groggy. She rubbed the sleep from her eyes and noticed Clover, Alex and Jerry all looking at her with concern on their faces.

"What's everyone looking at?"

Clover and Alex burst out a pair of smiles and high-fived each other. Jerry allowed himself a self-assured smile. "You see girls, I told you we could undo the brain-washing."

Sam blinked, confused. "Brain-washing?" Suddenly it all came back to her. "I remember now! Dr. Young dressed me up like a baby and stuck me in front of some hypo screen." Sam was angry, so much in fact that it took her a moment before she thought to look down at what she was wearing. Sure enough she was still dressed in a t-shirt and diaper and wearing nothing else. Sam's face immediately turned a bright red.

Jerry began to explain. "Yes you were in quite the predicament. Fortunately Clover and Alex were able to rescue you and the other prisoners and we were able to reverse the brain-washing. Mostly."

"Too bad that crazy baby guy got away." Alex said.

"Well now that I'm back to normal do you think you could find me some normal clothes?" Sam wanted out of her diaper yesterday.

"Yes, well I'm afraid we're going to have to leave your diaper on for the foreseeable future," Jerry said.

"What!" Sam cried. "Why! You said you cured the brain washing!"

"Mostly cured," Jerry corrected. "Perhaps a demonstration would be best." Jerry reached into his pocked and pulled out a set of keys. "Look at the shiny keys Sam. Aren't they pretty?"

Sam scoffed. "Jerry I'm not a-" As soon as Sam actually looked at the keys her mind seemed to empty. She reached to with both hands and tried to grab the keys but Jerry pulled them away.

"Sam. Sam!" Clover called out.

Sam shook her head clear. "What was that all about? I just looked at hose shiny keys and I couldn't focus on anything. It's like my mind was total blank!"

"Yes, a side effect of the brain-washing. You were made to think you were a baby and that programing is still inside your head. Under the right circumstances it will re-assert itself for brief periods."

"You mean I could turn into a drooling baby at any time?" Sam cried out.

"Yes, but don't worry. Over time the brain-washing will wear off completely and you'll return to your normal teenaged self."

"Wonderful," Sam pouted. "Anything else?"

"Well the experience has probably compromised your bladder and bowel control so you'll need to wear diapers until you can be re-toilet trained."

"What?" Sam held back tears, not wanting the others to see her cry.

"Oh, poor little Sammy," Clover put her hand on Sam's shoulder.

"I wish there was something we could do to help," Alex mused.

"Oh there most certainly is," Jerry answered. "Sam will need someone to look after her while she recovers. Someone to make sure her needs are looked after, see that she's feed and change her diapers."

"Whoa whoa whoa!" Clover screamed. "I am not changing any diapers!"

"Until her toilet-training returns to her someone is going to have to."

Sam buried her head in her hands. This time it was Alex who came to comfort her. "Don't worry Sam. We'll look after you."

"We will?"

"Yes, of course we will," Alex said firmly. "We're your best friends."

"But I don't want to wear diapers." Sam was sobbing outright now.

"If I make a suggestion," Jerry stepped forward. He held out a pacifier to Sam. "If you're feeling upset this will calm you down."

"I'm not going to suck on that!" Sam objected.

"Just put it in your mouth and you'll feel better. I promise," Alex said.

"But I don't wanna!"

"Oh for pete's sake." Clover grabbed the pacifier and stuck it in Sam's mouth. Sam's eyes widened and she immediately began sucking on it.

"It's just like she's a baby again," Alex observed.

"It will come and go," Jerry assured them.
1251211.title: Sam rescued

choices: Mal takes them to Tony and Lee.
The siblings want their diapers changed.
1252.content:
The door opened and Marc and Megan walked into the white room.

“Welcome to the Centralized Rehabilitation and Incarceration Building,” a mechanical voice said.

“I’m beginning to have second thoughts about this,“ Marc said.

“Well it’s too late to turn back now,” Megan responded.

Suddenly a series of mechanical arms descended from the ceiling. The arms projected red lasers onto the pair then spun around them. The arms disappeared and Marc and Megan’s clothes came apart, falling to the ground in tatters.

Both kids were shocked. Their arms went to cover themselves, then they each glanced at the other and made eye contact. This only made the situation worse as both parties began blushing furiously and they quickly turned away.

“Please lie on your backs,” the computer voice said. Marc and Megan didn’t want to, but they had a mission, so after some hesitation they lay on the white floor.

Robotic tentacles then grabbed them by the ankles and held them in the air. Another arm came along both siblings felt prick on their bottoms. As the arm left they could each see an empty syringe. Next, tentacles began sprinkling a white powder on their nether regions. Finally their bottoms were lifted off the ground, before being placed back down, only now their bottoms were on a soft white material. The tentacles pulled up the material so it wrapped around their entire crotch region and a loud clicking noise was heard. Then the tentacles all disappeared. The two siblings stood up and looked at each other, then down at themselves. They were both wearing diapers.

The tentacles appeared again, dropping from the ceiling, this time they had in their grasp a pair of shirts. The tentacles slid the shirts over the siblings’ heads and in a second they were each wearing a t-shirt. Pink for Megan and blue for Marc. They looked down at themselves and examined their new attire. The shirts were normal, but their diapers looked different from anything they had seen before. They were made of a tough elastic material, and instead of tapes the front and back were connected by strong plastic mechanisms.

“Preparations are complete. Please make your way into the main complex,” the computer voice said. “Have a nice day.”

The seamless white wall split open, revealing a door, and Marc and Megan made their way through it.

The room they entered was large, and it was filled with people. Children and teens were scattered about, each minding their own business. But, like Marc and Megan, they were all wearing diapers.

“Well, well, well. It looks like we got some fresh meat.”

Marc and Megan turned to see the one addressing them. She was a black-haired teen, maybe 16 years old.

“Hi, I’m Megan and this is my brother Mar- oh!” Suddenly Megan felt something rumble in her bottom. She clenched her butt and her hands grasped at her diaper’s rear.

“Megan, what’s wron- Ah!” Marc felt the same thing and began his own dance.

“That would be the shots taking effect,” the black-haired girl said. “Even as we speak they’re taking away your toilet training. Name’s Mal by the way.”

“Wha- what?”

“Aw, how cute. You’ve never messed yourself before have you? Well don’t worry, soon enough you won’t even be able to tell when you mess your diapers.”

Megan began fiddling with her diaper’s fastening mechanism. But there was a problem. “These things won’t come off!”

“Nope. These are special diapers, with a magnetic lock. Only way to get them off is to ask a nanny to do it for you.” Mal gestured to a robot not far away dressed in a nanny outfit.

“This is the weirdest prison I’ve ever been to,” Marc said.

“It’s not a prison. It’s the C.R.I.B. Some new-fangled alternative. Regular prison makes you tough, so this place teaches you to be meek and submissive. They make you wear diapers and use them. Meals come in bottles, you sleep in a crib, and in general they treat you like a baby. They figure when you come out at the end you're gonna be less naughty and more willing to do what you’re told.” As she finished Marc and Megan could hear a hissing noise. They looked down and saw a yellow spot on the front of Mal’s diaper grow and grow. “What?” Mal looked down and took notice of the spot. “Oh, I guess I’m wet. Like I said, soon you won’t even be able to tell when you poop, much less pee.”

“We came here looking for our brothers," Megan said. “Tony and Lee. Do you know them?”

“I think I know the guys you mean. Came in a few days ago. I let them know what they’re in for, just like I’m telling you to now.”

“What are you, some kind of welcome party?” Marc asked, still dancing around.

“Kind of. See, my favourite thing to do is to watch newbies as they mess themselves. After a little while people get used to having accidents, and it becomes pretty boring, but there’s something special about seeing someone poop their diapers for the very first time.”

"I'm not going to-" But before Megan could finish she felt something exit her bottom. As she messed her diaper she looked over at Marc and saw that he too was filling his diaper with warm mushy poop.
1252.title: C.R.I.B.

info.brief_description: Stories about cartoon and anime characters wearing and using diapers.
info.description:
Diaper stories based in ten different settings.

Rules:

- Nothing sexually explicite.
- Keep everyone in character.
- Keep formating consistent.
- No entries that are only a few sentences long. Actually make contributions to the story.

The author can and will remove entries that are only one or two sentences long. Entries that are one large run on sentence will also be deleted.
